fields.plot: A group of astronomers go on an expedition to the Moon.::Kenneth Chisholm
Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.::Alan Smithee

A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.::grantss

A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>

In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.::Kenneth Chisholm
A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.::Anonymous

In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
When Union spies steal an engineer's beloved locomotive, he pursues it single-handedly and straight through enemy lines.::Kenneth Chisholm <kchishol@mnsi.net>
An allegorical tale about a man fighting the good and evil within him. Both sides are made flesh - one a sophisticated woman he is attracted to and the other his wife.::HF
Hopelessly in love with a woman working at MGM Studios, a clumsy man attempts to become a motion picture cameraman to be close to the object of his desire.::Daniel Jos. Leary

fields.movie_title: The Passion of Joan of Arc
fields.plot: In 1431, Jeanne d'Arc is placed on trial on charges of heresy. The ecclesiastical jurists attempt to force Jeanne to recant her claims of holy visions.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
Luis Buñuel and Salvador Dalí present 16 minutes of bizarre, surreal imagery.

fields.movie_title: All Quiet on the Western Front
fields.plot: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.
With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.::J. S. Golden
When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.::Anonymous
A drifter obsessed with the supernatural stumbles upon an inn where a severely ill adolescent girl is slowly becoming a vampire.
Rufus T. Firefly is named president/dictator of bankrupt Freedonia and declares war on neighboring Sylvania over the love of wealthy Mrs. Teasdale.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
The Three Little Pigs each build a house of different material. The Big Bad Wolf comes along and blows away the straw and stick homes, but is unable to destroy the house of bricks.
Newly married couple Juliette and a ship captain Jean struggle through marriage as they travel on the L'atalante along with the captain's first mate Le père Jules and a cabin boy.::Vamsi krishna D S
A renegade reporter and a crazy young heiress meet on a bus heading for New York, and end up stuck with each other when the bus leaves them behind at one of the stops.::yusufpiskin

A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage Agent. But when the Agent is killed, and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Dr. Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.::sspurli
A sly business manager and two wacky friends of two opera singers help them achieve success while humiliating their stuffy and snobbish enemies.::Kenneth Chisholm
The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.::Anonymous

fields.movie_title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
fields.plot: Exiled into the dangerous forest by her wicked stepmother, a princess is rescued by seven dwarf miners who make her part of their household.::Dynasti Noble
When Prince John and the Norman Lords begin oppressing the Saxon masses in King Richard's absence, a Saxon lord fights back as the outlaw leader of a rebel guerrilla army.::Kenneth Chisholm
While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.::L. Hamre
While travelling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.::alfiehitchie

fields.movie_title: You Can't Take It with You
fields.plot: A man from a family of rich snobs becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family.::L. Hamre
A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.::Carl Schultz
A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.
A stern Russian woman sent to Paris on official business finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.::Anonymous
A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.::Travis Stoffs
A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.::David Rush

Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home to Kansas and help her friends as well.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.::Kenneth Chisholm
On the eve of World War II, a young American reporter tries to expose enemy agents in London.
A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.::Kenneth Chisholm
Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.::Anonymous
A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.::Anonymous
When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.::Anonymous

Two employees at a gift shop can barely stand each other, without realizing that they are falling in love through the post as each other's anonymous pen pal.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.::Carl Schultz
At the turn of the century in a Welsh mining village, the Morgans, he stern, she gentle, raise coal-mining sons and hope their youngest will find a better life.::Ed Stephan <stephan@cc.wwu.edu>
A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.::J. Spurlin
A Hollywood director, John L Sullivan, sets out to experience life as a poor, homeless person in order to gain relevant life experience for his next movie.::grantss
Larry Talbot returns to his father's castle in Wales and meets a beautiful woman. One fateful night, Talbot escorts her to a local carnival where they meet a mysterious gypsy fortune teller.
The story of a young deer growing up in the forest.::Colin Tinto <cst@imdb.com>
A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.::Noah Orent
The spoiled young heir to the decaying Amberson fortune comes between his widowed mother and the man she has always loved.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
A young man accused of sabotage goes on the lam to prove his innocence.

fields.movie_title: To Be or Not to Be
fields.plot: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>

A woman returning home falls asleep and has vivid dreams that may or may not be happening in reality. Through repetitive images and complete mismatching of the objective view of time and space, her dark inner desires play out on-screen.::Samovarkov
When a posse captures three men suspected of killing a local farmer, they become strongly divided over whether or not to lynch the men.::Directorgene
A young girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

A writer of books on the futility of marriage risks his reputation when he decides to get married. Things get even more complicated when he learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are habitual murderers.::Carl Schultz
An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.

Years after her aunt was murdered in her home, a young woman moves back into the house with her new husband. However, he has a secret that he will do anything to protect, even if it means driving his wife insane.::David Rush

fields.movie_title: The Best Years of Our Lives
fields.plot: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.::Bruce Stadfeld <stadfel@cc.umanitoba.ca>
A police detective falls in love with the woman whose murder he is investigating.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the crew members of the U-boat that sank their ship.::Anonymous / Hans Delbruck
Young love and childish fears highlight a year in the life of a turn-of-the-century family.
During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.::duke1029@aol.com
Meeting a stranger in a railway station, a woman is tempted to cheat on her husband.::Anonymous
Chance events trap hitchhiking nightclub pianist Al Roberts in a tightening net of death, deception and blackmail.::Rod Crawford <puffinus@u.washington.edu>
The theatrical life of a beautiful courtesan and the four men who love her.
The desperate life of a chronic alcoholic is followed through a four-day drinking bout.::Rod Crawford <puffinus@u.washington.edu>
A psychiatrist protects the identity of an amnesia patient accused of murder while attempting to recover his memory.::Anonymous
Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired by a wealthy family. Before the complex case is over, he's seen murder, blackmail, and what might be love.
A small-time gambler hired to work in a Buenos Aires casino discovers his employer's new wife is his former lover.::Noah Orent
An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.::Kenneth Chisholm

fields.movie_title: A Matter of Life and Death
fields.plot: A British wartime aviator who cheats death must argue for his life before a celestial court.::Eugene Kim <genekim@concentric.net>
The Earps battle the Clantons at the OK Corral in Tombstone, Arizona.::Michael Crew <m.crew@bbcnc.org.uk>
During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.::Jonathan Hayward
When a nice old man who claims to be Santa Claus is institutionalized as insane, a young lawyer decides to defend him by arguing in court that he is the real thing.::Kenneth Chisholm
A suave but cynical man supports his family by marrying and murdering rich women for their money, but the job has some occupational hazards.::Kenneth Chisholm

At Fort Apache, an honorable and veteran war captain finds conflict when his regime is placed under the command of a young, glory hungry lieutenant colonel with no respect for the local Indian tribe.::Daniel Jos. Leary
A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.::Anonymous
In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.
Fascinated by gorgeous Mrs. Bannister, seaman Michael O'Hara joins a bizarre yachting cruise, and ends up mired in a complex murder plot.::Rod Crawford <puffinus@u.washington.edu>
Dunson leads a cattle drive, the culmination of over 14 years of work, to its destination in Missouri. But his tyrannical behavior along the way causes a mutiny, led by his adopted son.
A young ballet dancer is torn between the man she loves and her pursuit to become a prima ballerina.::David Rush
Two men attempt to prove they committed the perfect crime by hosting a dinner party after strangling their former classmate to death.::Anonymous

fields.movie_title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
fields.plot: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.::Karl Krejci

Noriko is twenty-seven years old and still living with her widowed father. Everybody tries to talk her into marrying, but Noriko wants to stay at home caring for her father.::Arnoud Tiele (imdb@tiele.nl)
A distant poor relative of the Duke D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.::Gabe Taverney (duke1029@aol.com)

Captain Nathan Brittles, on the eve of retirement, takes out a last patrol to stop an impending massive Indian attack. Encumbered by women who must be evacuated, Brittles finds his mission imperiled.::Jim Beaver <jumblejim@prodigy.net>
Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.::Anonymous
A psychopathic criminal with a mother complex makes a daring break from prison and leads his old gang in a chemical plant payroll heist.::Ted Sancto
A seemingly timid but secretly ruthless ingénue insinuates herself into the lives of an aging Broadway star and her circle of theater friends.::LVJeff
A major heist goes off as planned, but then double crosses, bad luck and solid police work cause everything to unravel.::jgp3553@yahoo.com

Due to his insistence that he has an invisible six foot-tall rabbit for a best friend, a whimsical middle-aged man is thought by his family to be insane - but he may be wiser than anyone knows.::Carl Schultz
A potentially violent screenwriter is a murder suspect until his lovely neighbor clears him. However, she soon starts to have her doubts.::Rod Crawford <puffinus@u.washington.edu>

A group of juvenile delinquents live a violent and crime-filled life in the festering slums of Mexico City, and the morals of young Pedro are gradually corrupted and destroyed by the others.::Michael Brooke <michael@everyman.demon.co.uk>
The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.::Eugene Kim <genekim@concentric.net>
A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.::Noah Orent
In WWI Africa, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.
Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.::Karl Krejci

A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.::Karl Krejci
Fierce Roman commander Marcus Vinicius becomes infatuated with beautiful Christian hostage Lygia and begins questioning the tyrannical leadership of the despot Emperor Nero.::duke1029@aol.com
A psychopath forces a tennis star to comply with his theory that two strangers can get away with murder.::Noah Orent
Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.::Tom Benton
Scientists and American Air Force officials fend off a bloodthirsty alien organism while at a remote arctic outpost.::zachtrokanski

A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon when the gang leader, an outlaw he sent up years ago, arrives on the noon train.::weijaytan-2015
A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.::rgoes
A fading comedian and a suicidally despondent ballet dancer must look to each other to find purpose and hope in their lives.::Kenneth Chisholm
A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.::Anonymous
An elderly man and his dog struggle to survive on his government pension in Rome.::Karl Krejci
Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.::Rod Crawford <puffinus@u.washington.edu>
In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.::Anonymous

Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.::David Rush
Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.::<jgp3553@excite.com>
A priest, who comes under suspicion for murder, cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.::TompaDompa
As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.::Anonymous
A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.::alfiehitchie
A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.::alfiehitchie
A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.::Anonymous
A pair of teenagers meet one summer day, start a reckless affair and abandon their families to be with one another.
When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German P.O.W. camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.::alfiehitchie
An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.::J. Spurlin
A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.::MisterWilliamTell
Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation and accidentally, but good-naturedly, causes havoc.::Ian Pugh <skypilot@ptd.net>
A character study of five young men at crucial turning points in their lives in a small town in Italy.::Anonymous
A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.::Kenneth Chisholm
When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardizes the ship, the first officer relieves him of command and faces court martial for mutiny.::Kenneth Chisholm
A strange prehistoric beast lurks in the depths of the Amazonian jungle. A group of scientists try to capture the animal and bring it back to civilization for study.::Glen_Chapman
The wife and mistress of a loathed school principal plan to murder him with what they believe is the perfect alibi.::grantss
A former tennis player tries to arrange his wife's murder after learning of her affair.::Lila Tov
After helping a wounded gang member, a strong-willed female saloon owner is wrongly suspected of murder and bank robbery by a lynch mob.::Directorgene
An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.::jgp3553
A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.::Col Needham <cn@imdb.com>
In medieval Japan, a compassionate governor is sent into exile. His wife and children try to join him, but are separated, and the children grow up amid suffering and oppression.::Samovarkov
In 1850 Oregon, when a backwoodsman brings a wife home to his farm, his six brothers decide that they want to get married too.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A care-free girl is sold to a traveling entertainer, consequently enduring physical and emotional pain along the way.::zachtrokanski
The earliest atomic tests in New Mexico cause common ants to mutate into giant man-eating monsters that threaten civilization.::Gabe Taverney (duke1029@aol.com)
A successful song-and-dance team become romantically involved with a sister act and team up to save the failing Vermont inn of their former commanding general.::duke1029
A successful farmyard revolution by the resident animals vs. the farmer goes horribly wrong as the victors create a new tyranny among themselves.::Kenneth Chisholm
A one-armed stranger comes to a tiny town possessing a terrible past they want to keep secret, by violent means if necessary.::Kenneth Chisholm
Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...::Rod Crawford <puffinus@u.washington.edu>
Two brothers struggle to maintain their strict, Bible-toting father's favor.
A doomed female hitchhiker pulls Mike Hammer into a deadly whirlpool of intrigue, revolving around a mysterious "great whatsit".::Rod Crawford <puffinus@u.washington.edu>
A middle-aged butcher and a school teacher who have given up on the idea of love meet at a dance and fall for each other.
A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid the $10,000 he'd stolen in a robbery.::alfiehitchie
Follows the lives of the Borgen family, as they deal with inner conflict, as well as religious conflict with each other, and the rest of the town.::Brian Berta
Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.::Swarup Basak
A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.::Ian Pugh <skypilot@ezaccess.net>
When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbbor.
In the first of a trilogy of movies about Elisabeth "Sissi" of Austria, the young vibrant princess catches the eye of her sister's fiancé, Emperor Franz Josef.::L. Hamre
A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.::Noah Orent

The trouble with Harry is that he is dead and, while no one really minds, everyone feels responsible. After Harry's body is found in the woods, several locals must determine not only how and why he was killed but what to do with the body.
A red balloon with a mind of its own follows a little boy around the streets of Paris.::Joshua Bond <jdbond@mit.edu>
A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.::Kenneth Chisholm
Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.::<jgp3553@yahoo.com>
A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>

fields.movie_title: The Man Who Knew Too Much
fields.plot: A tale of innocent American tourists in Morocco whose son's kidnapping sets off a twisting plot of international intrigue.
The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.::Kenneth Chisholm
An American Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches.

The second in a trilogy of movies about Elisabeth "Sissi" of Austria, the film chronicles the married life of the young empress as she tries to adjust to formal and strict life in the palace and an overbearing mother-in-law.::L. Hamre
Moses, an Egyptian Prince, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.::Kenneth Chisholm
Two clumsy provincial uncles visit a metropolis to stop the relationship between their nephew and a woman of ill repute.
A captured French Resistance fighter during WWII engineers a daunting escape from a Nazi prison in France.::Samovarkov
A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.::ahmetkozan
A couple falls in love and agrees to meet in six months at the Empire State Building - but will it happen?::<jgp3553@yahoo.com>

fields.movie_title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
fields.plot: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, not knowing that the allied forces are planning to destroy it.::Chris White
An impromptu fashion shoot at a book store brings about a new fashion model discovery in the shop clerk.::statmanjeff
When Scott Carey begins to shrink because of exposure to a combination of radiation and insecticide, medical science is powerless to help him.::Gabe Taverney (duke1029@aol.com)
A war-hardened general, egged on by his ambitious wife, works to fulfill a prophecy that he would become lord of Spider's Web Castle.::Kenneth Chisholm
Monsieur Hulot visits the technology-driven world of his sister, brother-in-law, and nephew, but he can't quite fit into the surroundings.::Ian Pugh <skypilot@ptd.net>
A waifish prostitute wanders the streets of Rome looking for true love but finds only heartbreak.::Geoff Poole <poole1@fas.harvard.edu>
After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

fields.movie_title: Sissi: The Fateful Years of an Empress
fields.plot: The final film in a highly romanticized trilogy about Elisabeth "Sissi" of Austria finds the young empress traveling throughout Europe.::L. Hamre
A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.::Joa
After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.::Eugene Kim <genekim@concentric.net>
Powerful but unethical Broadway columnist J.J. Hunsecker coerces unscrupulous press agent Sidney Falco into breaking up his sister's romance with a jazz musician.::duke1029@aol.com
A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.::Kenneth Chisholm
A self-assured businessman murders his employer, the husband of his mistress, which unintentionally provokes an ill-fated chain of events.::zachtrokanski

fields.movie_title: Cat on a Hot Tin Roof
fields.plot: Brick is an alcoholic ex-football player who drinks his days away and resists the affections of his wife. A reunion with his terminal father jogs a host of memories and revelations for both father and son.::Cinenastee (eagle4forr@netscape.net)
Lured by gold, two greedy peasants unknowingly escort a princess and her general across enemy lines.::Samovarkov
A motley quintet of inept small-time thieves attempt the burglary of a local pawnshop in this Italian farce.::Gabe Taverney (duke1029@aol.com)
A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.::alfiehitchie
A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.::Noah Orent
In a murder trial, the defendant says he suffered temporary insanity after the victim raped his wife. What is the truth, and will he win his case?::Anonymous
After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.::Kenneth Chisholm
During World War II, a teenage Jewish girl named Anne Frank and her family are forced into hiding in the Nazi-occupied Netherlands.::David Mullich <dmullich@aol.com>
A French actress filming an anti-war film in Hiroshima has an affair with a married Japanese architect as they share their differing perspectives on war.::duke1029@aol.com
A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.::Kenneth Chisholm
During World War II, a commander finds himself stuck with a decrepit (and pink) submarine, a con man executive officer, and a group of army nurses.
A young boy, left without attention, delves into a life of petty crime.::Zaheer Qureshi

A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a cripple, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.::Bruce Stadfeld <stadfel@cc.umanitoba.ca>
After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.::Kenneth Chisholm
A surgeon causes an accident which leaves his daughter disfigured, and goes to extremes to give her a new face.

In 1836, a small band of soldiers sacrifice their lives in hopeless combat against a massive army in order to prevent a tyrant from smashing the new Republic of Texas.::Jim Beaver <jumblejim@prodigy.net>
A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.::Anonymous
A woman disappears during a Mediterranean boating trip. During the search, her lover and her best friend become attracted to each other.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
A series of stories following a week in the life of a philandering tabloid journalist living in Rome.::Daniel Jos. Leary
Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.::Anonymous

An innocent yet pampered young virgin and her family's pregnant and jealous servant set out to deliver candles to church, but only one returns from events that transpire in the woods along the way.::KADC
A day in the life of an unfaithful married couple and their steadily deteriorating relationship.::Daniel Jos. Leary
A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.::Eugene Kim <genekim@concentric.net>
Tom Ripley is a talented mimic, moocher, forger and all-around criminal improviser; but there's more to Tom Ripley than even he can guess.::J. Spurlin
A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
Having recently been uprooted to Milan, Rocco and his four brothers each look for a new way in life when a prostitute comes between Rocco and his brother Simone.::Daniel Jos. Leary
A Swiss family must survive being shipwrecked on a deserted island.::Kenneth Chisholm
In prison four long-sentence inmates planning an elaborate escape cautiously induct a new inmate to join in their scheme which leads to distrust and uncertainty.::Daniel Jos. Leary
The misadventures of a TV writer both at work and at home.::Kenneth Chisholm
A pimp with no other means to provide for himself finds his life spiraling out of control when his prostitute is sent to prison.::Daniel Jos. Leary
In a strange and isolated chateau, a man becomes acquainted with a woman and insists that they have met before.::Anonymous-733
A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.
A rebellious student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of lesbianism.::Anonymous
In the Italy of WWII, a widow and her lonely daughter seek for distance between them and the horrors of war.::Andrea Aloisi

A team of allied saboteurs are assigned an impossible mission: infiltrate an impregnable Nazi-held island and destroy the two enormous long-range field guns that prevent the rescue of 2,000 trapped British soldiers.::yusufpiskin
An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.::Anonymous
In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.::Mark Logan <marklo@west.sun.com>
Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.::Anonymous
A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who is struggling to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle.::jgp3553@yahoo.com

When a litter of Dalmatian puppies are abducted by the minions of Cruella de Vil, the parents must find them before she uses them for a diabolical fashion statement.::Kenneth Chisholm (kchishol@mnsi.net)
In West Berlin during the Cold War, a Coca-Cola executive is given the task of taking care of his boss' socialite daughter.
Recently released from a mental hospital, Karin rejoins her emotionally disconnected family in their island home, only to slip from reality as she begins to believe she is being visited by God.
A French striptease artist is desperate to become a mother. When her reluctant boyfriend suggests that his best friend impregnate her, feelings become complicated when she accepts.::Daniel Jos. Leary
Viridiana, a young nun about to take her final vows, pays a visit to her widowed uncle at the request of her Mother Superior.::ukjf
A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.::Kenneth Chisholm
After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.::Mystic80
Cleo, a singer and hypochondriac, becomes increasingly worried that she might have cancer while awaiting test results from her doctor.

A married Sicilian baron falls in love with his cousin and vows to wed her, but with divorce illegal he must concoct a crime of passion to do away with his wife.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.::Carl Schultz

When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.::Daniel Jos. Leary
A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the nineteenth century - including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
During WWII, Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev strikes up a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers while working as a scout behind the German lines.::nufs68
The story of a man forced to explore his memories in the wake of World War III's devastation, told through still images.::pyukumuku
The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.::grantss
The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.::Anonymous

Having renounced her ignominious past, a former streetwalker reunites with her son. However, an extortion scheme endangers her aspirations for a decent bourgeois life. Can she protect him from the same snares that wounded her youth?::Nick Riganas

fields.movie_title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
fields.plot: A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

A couple pick up a hitchhiker on the way to their yacht. The husband invites the young man to come along for their day's sailing. As the voyage progresses, the antagonism between the two men grows. A violent confrontation is inevitable.::grantss
A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.::<jgp3553@yahoo.com>
An impulsive braggart takes a shy law student for a two-day ride through the Roman and Tuscany countries.::Samovarkov
Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
Twelve episodic tales in the life of a Parisian woman and her slow descent into prostitution.::Daniel Jos. Leary

fields.movie_title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
fields.plot: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.::ahmetkozan
The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
A young woman meets a vital young man, but their love affair is doomed because of the man's materialistic nature.::John Land <jland@pobox.com>
A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.::Eugene Kim <genekim@concentric.net>
A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.
Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?
Queen Cleopatra VII of Egypt experiences both triumph and tragedy as she attempts to resist the imperial ambitions of Rome.::filmfactsman

fields.movie_title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
fields.plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.
James Bond willingly falls into an assassination plot involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by S.P.E.C.T.R.E.::Helltopay27
The Prince of Salina, a noble aristocrat of impeccable integrity, tries to preserve his family and class amid the tumultuous social upheavals of 1860's Sicily.::Gabe Taverney (duke1029@aol.com)
Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.::Chris White
Stories about three very different women and the men they attract.::Anonymous
In Paris, a former policeman falls in love with a prostitute, and tries to get her out of that life by paying for all of her time.

fields.movie_title: It's a Mad Mad Mad Mad World
fields.plot: A group of motorists hear about a crook's hidden stash of loot, and race against each other across the country to get to it.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
Screenwriter Paul Javal's marriage to his wife Camille disintegrates during movie production as she spends time with the producer. Layered conflicts between art and business ensue.::Noossab
A small-town priest struggles with his faith.::Karl Krejci

The bumbling Inspector Clouseau travels to Rome to catch a notorious jewel thief known as "The Phantom" before he conducts his most daring heist yet: a princess' priceless diamond with one slight imperfection, known as "The Pink Panther".::jgp3553@yahoo.com
A poor boy named Arthur learns the power of love, kindness, knowledge and bravery with the help of a wizard called Merlin in the path to become one of the most beloved kings in English history.
An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.::duke1029@aol.com

A dying mob boss hands over his business to an old friend, Fernand. The boss' assistants want to get rid of the latter. But are the Volfoni brothers and Théo real threats? Ensuing fights and shootouts are more comical than deadly.::Teyss
Boris Karloff hosts a trio of horror stories concerning a stalked call girl, a vampire-like monster who preys on his family, and a nurse who is haunted by her ring's rightful owner.::tanglefreak98
An uptight English writer travelling to Crete, on a matter of business, finds his life changed forever when he meets the gregarious Alexis Zorba.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
Two crooks with a fondness for old Hollywood B-movies convince a languages student to help them commit a robbery.::Mr_John_Barrymore
Criminals have chosen an ordinary man to carry drugs and jewels in his car across the border. The problem is that this man turned out too much ordinary.
In an industrial area, Giuliana, an unstable woman, attempts to cope with life by starting an affair with a co-worker at the plant her husband manages.::Brian Berta
A technical malfunction sends American planes to Moscow to deliver a nuclear attack. Can all-out war be averted?::Anonymous
Gendarme Ludovic Cruchot is re-assigned to the French Riviera seaside resort town of Saint-Tropez where petty criminals and his own daughter give him a hard time.::nufs68
While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.::Kenneth Chisholm

Over two "typical" days in the life of The Beatles, the boys struggle to keep themselves and Sir Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live television performance.::Colin Tinto <cst@imdb.com>
Surprised that their contract victim didn't try to run away from them, two professional hit men try to find out who hired them and why.::G. Taverney (duke1029@aol.com)
Mark marries Marnie although she is a habitual thief and has serious psychological problems, and tries to help her confront and resolve them.::Anonymous
In turn of the century London, a magical nanny employs music and adventure to help two neglected children become closer to their father.::Carl Schultz
The rich man Domenico and Filumena, a penniless prostitute, share great part of their lives in the immediate post WWII Italy.::Andrea Aloisi
Snobbish phonetics Professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make flower girl Eliza Doolittle presentable in high society.::Noah Orent

Two women kill samurais and sell their belongings for a living. While one of them is having an affair with their neighbor, the other woman meets a mysterious samurai wearing a bizarre mask.::Samovarkov
A young woman separated from her lover by war faces a life-altering decision.
A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.::<jgp3553@excite.com>
A misfit reindeer and his friends look for a place that will accept them.::Kenneth Chisholm
Inspector Jacques Clouseau investigates the murder of Mr. Benjamin Ballon's driver at a country estate.::nufs68
An entomologist on vacation is trapped by local villagers into living with a woman whose life task is shoveling sand for them.::Samovarkov & Anonymous-733
Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift.::Rob Hartill
A U.S. secret agent is sent to the distant space city of Alphaville where he must find a missing person and free the city from its tyrannical ruler.::Daniel Jos. Leary
In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.::Chthon2 <mezzodon@yahoo.com>
Depressed at the commercialism he sees around him, Charlie Brown tries to find a deeper meaning to Christmas.::Kenneth Chisholm

The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.::LVJeff
When Professor Marchand, a famous scientist, mysteriously disappears, the commissioner, Juve, immediately suspects Fantomas.::Anonymous
Sir Ringo Starr finds himself the human sacrifice target of a cult, and his fellow members of The Beatles must try to protect him from it.::Kenneth Chisholm
Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.::<jgp3553@excite.com>

Pierrot escapes his boring society and travels from Paris to the Mediterranean Sea with Marianne, a girl chased by hit-men from Algeria. They lead an unorthodox life, always on the run.::Stephan Eichenberg <eichenbe@fak-cbg.tu-muenchen.de>
A sex-repulsed woman who disapproves of her sister's boyfriend sinks into depression and has horrific visions of rape and violence.::Ivan Canady
A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
In the 23rd Century, Captain James T. Kirk and the crew of the U.S.S. Enterprise explore the galaxy and defend the United Federation of Planets.::Kenneth Chisholm
The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.::Karl Krejci
A group of misfits, headed by an incompetent knight named Brancaleone, set out to reach the small town of Aurocastro so that their leader can take possession of the fief.::Anonymous
The story of a mistreated donkey and the people around him. A study on saintliness and a sister piece to Bresson's Mouchette.::Gabriel Klinger <cklinger@earthlink.net>
A fashion photographer unknowingly captures a death on film after following two lovers in a park.

fields.movie_title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly
fields.plot: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.::Helltopay27
A grumpy hermit hatches a plan to steal Christmas from the Whos of Whoville.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>

A scientist is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his bloodstream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter it.::John Vogel <jlvogel@comcast.net>
Famous but unlucky pursuers of Fantomas from France go to weird Scotland for a final attempt to bring the impudent criminal to justice.
Several ordinary Frenchmen, helping British pilots avoid Nazi captivity, go on an epic voyage through the occupied country to the free zone.
The daughter of an art forger teams up with a burglar to steal one of her father's forgeries and protect his secret.

fields.movie_title: It's the Great Pumpkin, Charlie Brown
fields.plot: The Peanuts gang celebrates Halloween while Linus waits for the Great Pumpkin.::Kenneth Chisholm
The story of Sir Thomas More, who stood up to King Henry VIII when the King rejected the Roman Catholic Church to obtain a divorce and remarry.
A bitter, aging couple, with the help of alcohol, use their young houseguests to fuel anguish and emotional pain towards each other over the course of a distressing night.::zachtrokanski

Paul, a conservative young lawyer, marries the vivacious Corie. Their highly passionate relationship descends into comical discord in a five-flight New York City walk-up apartment.::Jim Cobb and Anonymous
Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.::MadMovieManiac
A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.
During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.::Kenneth Chisholm

Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher that is trying to steal their water.::David J. Kiseleski <davidk269@aol.com>
A noted professor and his dim-witted apprentice fall prey to their inquiring vampires, while on the trail of the ominous damsel in distress.::zachtrokanski
A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.::Anonymous
A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fiancé.
When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.::Kenneth Chisholm

After a botched robbery results in the brutal murder of a rural family, two drifters elude police, in the end coming to terms with their own mortality and the repercussions of their vile atrocity.::zachtrokanski

Louis-Philippe Fourchaume, another typical lead-role for French comedy superstar Louis de Funès, is the dictatorial CEO of a French company which designs and produces sail yachts, and fires in yet another tantrum his designer André Castagnier, not realizing that man is his only chance to land a vital contract with the Italian magnate Marcello Cacciaperotti. So he has to find him at his extremely rural birthplace in 'la France profonde', which proves a torturous odyssey for the spoiled rich man; when he does get there his torment is far from over: the country bumpkin refuses to resume his slavish position now the shoe is on the other foot, so Fourchaume is dragged along in the boorish family life, and at times unable to control his temper, which may cost him more credit then he painstakingly builds up...::KGF Vissers

Monsieur Hulot curiously wanders around a high-tech Paris, paralleling a trip with a group of American tourists. Meanwhile, a nightclub/restaurant prepares its opening night, but it's still under construction.::Ian Pugh <skypilot@ptd.net>
After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.::Daniel Jos. Leary
A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin-stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.::Matt Patay
After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.::Johnny

Provoked, Cleopatra bets Caesar, that she can build a big palace in 3 months. An architect is given 3 months or else.. Fortunately, Getafix/Panoramix, Asterix and Obelix come to Alexandria to help.::Scott Filtenborg
After being discharged from the army, Antoine Doinel centers a screwball comedy where he applies for different jobs and tries to make sense of his relationships with women.::Matthew Trahan
An all guts, no glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.::Mystic80

A down-on-his-luck inventor turns a broken-down Grand Prix car into a fancy vehicle for his children, and then they go off on a magical fantasy adventure to save their grandfather in a far-off land.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
Two sisters leave their small seaside town of Rochefort in search of romance. Hired as carnival singers, one falls for an American musician, while the other must search for her ideal partner.

The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.::grantss
1183 A.D.: King Henry II's three sons all want to inherit the throne, but he won't commit to a choice. They and his wife variously plot to force him.
A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.::Dave
Two friends try sharing an apartment, but their ideas of housekeeping and lifestyles are as different as night and day.::Anonymous
After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
A stage-play producer devises a plan to make money by producing a sure-fire flop.::John Plasket <d-range@earthling.net>
A young couple trying for a baby move into a fancy apartment surrounded by peculiar neighbors.::krasnoludek
A mysterious young man seduces each member of a bourgeois family. When he suddenly leaves, how will their lives change?::pyukumuku
While vacationing on a remote Scandanavian island with his younger pregnant wife, an artist has an emotional breakdown while confronting his repressed desires.::duke1029@aol.com
The Beatles agree to accompany Captain Fred in his yellow submarine and go to Pepperland to free it from the music-hating Blue Meanies.::Kenneth Chisholm <kchishol@mnsi.net>
In this allegorical story, a revolution led by pupil Mick Travis takes place at an old established private school in England.::Col Needham <cn@imdb.com>
The missions of the Supreme Headquarters Alien Defence Organization, which defends Earth from extra-terrestrial threats.::Kenneth Chisholm
An account of underground resistance fighters in Nazi-occupied France.::Karl Krejci

fields.movie_title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
fields.plot: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.::grantss

fields.movie_title: Once Upon a Time in the West
fields.plot: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.
Two bikers head from L.A. to New Orleans through the open country and desert lands, and along the way they meet a man who bridges a counter-culture gap of which they had been unaware.::Max Hall

Matchmaker Dolly Levi travels to Yonkers to find a partner for "half-a-millionaire" Horace Vandergelder, convincing his niece, his niece's intended, and his two clerks to travel to New York City along the way.
A rich businessman faces a quite weird problem - his wife's grandfather has been revived thanks to science. But he is not aware that many decades have passed.
A young, English working-class boy spends his free time caring for and training his pet kestrel.::alfiehitchie
A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.::Howard Koor

Lovers Marianne and Jean-Paul spend their vacation in a villa on the French Riviera near St-Tropez. Marianne invites her former lover, Harry, and his teenage daughter to stay. Tension rises between them, especially when Jean-Paul seduces Penelope.::Polly_Kat
A series of disjointed mythical tales set in first century Rome.::MisterWilliamTell
The life and times of Virgil Starkwell, inept bank robber.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>

Nun Sara (Shirley MacLaine) is on the run in Mexico and is saved from cowboys by Hogan (Clint Eastwood), who is preparing for a future mission to capture a French fort. The pair become good friends, but Sara never does tell him the true reason behind her being outlawed.::Eliot

fields.movie_title: The Bird with the Crystal Plumage
fields.plot: An American expatriate in Rome witnesses an attempted murder that is connected to an ongoing killing spree in the city, and conducts his own investigation despite himself and his girlfriend being targeted by the killer.::Matt Patay
Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding American brigadier general George Carnaby prisoner, but that's not all that's really going on.
An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.::<jgp3553@excite.com>

With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.::David
A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.::Kenneth Chisholm
A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.::alfiehitchie

fields.movie_title: Investigation of a Citizen Above Suspicion
fields.plot: A chief of detectives, homicide section, kills his mistress and deliberately leaves clues to prove his own responsibility for the crime.::Damir Dukich <Damir.Dukic@snet.fer.uni-lj.si>
A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.::<jgp3553@yahoo.com>
Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.::Anonymous
The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.::Kenneth Chisholm
A fairy godmother helps a princess disguise and flee the kingdom so she won't have to marry the king who happens to be her father.::<hannibal.a@topnet.tn>

fields.movie_title: The Private Life of Sherlock Holmes
fields.plot: When a bored Holmes eagerly takes the case of Gabrielle Valladon after an attempt on her life, the search for her missing husband leads to Loch Ness and the legendary monster.::duke1029@aol.com
The story of the 1941 Japanese air raid on Pearl Harbor, and the series of preceding American blunders that aggravated its effectiveness.::Kenneth Chisholm

At Zabriskie Point, which overlooks the Grand Canyon's lowest point, two perfect strangers meet; an undergraduate dreamer and a young hippie student who start an unrestrained romance, making love on the dusty terrain.::Nick Riganas

fields.movie_title: And Now for Something Completely Different
fields.plot: An anthology of the best sketches from the first and second seasons of Monty Python's Flying Circus (1969).::Kenneth Chisholm
A team of top scientists work feverishly in a secret, state-of-the-art laboratory to discover what has killed the citizens of a small town and learn how this deadly contagion can be stopped.
When a bumbling New Yorker is dumped by his activist girlfriend, he travels to a tiny Latin American nation and becomes involved in its latest rebellion.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical magician conman search for the missing component to a magic spell to be used in the defense of Britain in World War II.::Kenneth Chisholm

A conscientious factory worker gets his finger cut off by a machine. Although the physical handicap is not serious, the accident causes him to become more involved in political and revolutionary groups.::Anonymous
In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.::Will S

In 17th-century France, Father Urbain Grandier seeks to protect the city of Loudun from the corrupt establishment of Cardinal Richelieu. Hysteria occurs within the city when he is accused of witchcraft by a sexually repressed nun.::Criterion10

When a madman calling himself "the Scorpio Killer" menaces the city, tough-as-nails San Francisco Police Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to track down and ferret out the crazed psychopath.::trivwhiz
A business commuter is pursued and terrorized by the malevolent driver of a massive tractor-trailer.::Kenneth Chisholm
In prerevolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant contends with marrying off three of his daughters while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
In 17th-century Spain, the Minister of Finance tries to dishonor the queen with an overly complex plan.
A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.::Ian Pugh <skypilot@ptd.net>
When his brother dies under mysterious circumstances in a car accident, London gangster Jack Carter travels to Newcastle to investigate.::Anonymous
A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.::David Levene <D.S.Levene@durham.ac.uk>
Young, rich, and obsessed with death, Harold finds himself changed forever when he meets lively septuagenarian Maude at a funeral.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>

In this tragic, dark, anti-war satire, a patriotic young American in WW1 is rendered blind, deaf, limbless, and mute by a horrific artillery shell attack. Trapped in what's left of his body, he desperately looks for a way to end his life.
A small-town detective searching for a missing man has only one lead: a connection with a New York prostitute.
In 1951, a group of high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied North Texas town that is slowly dying, both culturally and economically.::duke1029@aol.com
A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.::tanglefreak

A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
While recovering in Venice, sickly Composer Gustav von Aschenbach becomes dangerously fixated with teenager Tadzio.::Will S
Follows the lives of heroin addicts who frequent "Needle Park" in New York City.
The life of a disc jockey is turned upside down after a romantic encounter with an obsessed fan.

The murder of a wealthy countess, which was erroneously deemed suicide, triggers a chain reaction of brutal killings in the surrounding bay area, as several unscrupulous characters try to take over her large estate.::anonymous
A young American and his English wife come to rural England and face increasingly vicious local harassment.::Kenneth Chisholm <kchishol@execulink.com>
A young man sworn to an oath of non-violence works with his cousins in an ice factory where they mysteriously begin to disappear.::Kenneth Chisholm
During the 1970s, car delivery driver Kowalski delivers hot rods in record time but always runs into trouble with the highway cops.::nufs68

Two city-bred siblings are stranded in the Australian Outback, where they learn to survive with the aid of an Aboriginal boy on his "walkabout": a ritual separation from his tribe.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@cs.uq.oz.au>
A poor but hopeful boy seeks one of the five coveted golden tickets that will send him on a tour of Willy Wonka's mysterious chocolate factory.::Liam Wilhelm
The staff of an Army hospital in the Korean War find that laughter is the best way to deal with their situation.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
Bambino tries to teach his brother Trinity how to become an outlaw, but the two wind up saving a pioneer family and breaking up an arms ring instead.::Anonymous
In the 16th century, the ruthless and insane Don Lope de Aguirre leads a Spanish expedition in search of El Dorado.::Anonymous
A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.::Kenneth Chisholm

fields.movie_title: The Discreet Charm of the Bourgeoisie
fields.plot: A surreal, virtually plotless series of dreams centered around six middle-class people and their consistently interrupted attempts to have a meal together.::Anonymous

Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's dammed and turned into a lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a canoeing trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.::Tomius J. Barnard
A serial murderer is strangling women with a necktie. The London police have a suspect, but he is the wrong man.::Anonymous
A recently released ex-con and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.::Anonymous
An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.::Carl Schultz

fields.movie_title: The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe
fields.plot: A hapless orchestra player becomes an unwitting pawn of rival factions within the French secret service after he is chosen as a decoy by being identified as a super secret agent.::Stewart M. Clamen <clamen@cs.cmu.edu>
A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.::Tomius J. Barnard

A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.::Keith Loh <loh@sfu.ca>
A young man seeks vengence for the death of his teacher.::Kenneth Chisholm
A man visits his relatives at their restaurant in Italy and has to help them defend against brutal gangsters harassing them.::Kenneth Chisholm
A reporter and a promiscuous young woman try to solve a series of child killings in a remote southern Italian town rife with superstition and a distrust of outsiders.::matt-282

A bush-flying duo crash-land in the heart of the Peruvian jungle where an unscrupulous speculator controls a precious emerald source and an entire mining community. Can they right the wrongs, and in the process, manage to make a profit?::Nick Riganas

A neurotic film critic obsessed with the movie Casablanca (1942) attempts to get over his wife leaving him by dating again with the help of a married couple and his illusory idol, Humphrey Bogart.::mystic80
Nine people explore a cruise ship at sea in a manner that turns their whole lives upside down.
A man who loves games and theater invites his wife's lover to meet him, setting up a battle of wits with potentially deadly results.::Anonymous
A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.::Karl Krejci
When a woman dying of cancer in early twentieth-century Sweden is visited by her two sisters, long-repressed feelings between the siblings rise to the surface.::duke1029

After a tied 1st place in a local stunt race, two drivers start a contest to decide who of them will own the prize, a dune buggy. But when a mobster destroys the car, they are determined to get it back.::Anonymous
A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.::jgp3553@yahoo.com

fields.movie_title: The Mad Adventures of Rabbi Jacob
fields.plot: A bigoted Frenchman finds himself forced to impersonate a popular rabbi while on the run from a group of assassins - and the police.::Eugene Kim <genekim@concentric.net>
A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.::J. Spurlin
A secret agent comes to an opium lord's island fortress with other fighters for a martial-arts tournament.
In 1940, after watching and being traumatized by the movie Frankenstein (1931), a sensitive seven year-old girl living in a small Spanish village drifts into her own fantasy world.::duke1029
When a 12-year-old girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.::paulrichard
A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.::JoJo Mac
A young, easy-going gunman worships and competes with an old gunfighter who only wants to retire.::Robert Byars <robnshel@sirius.com>
Film version of the musical stage play, presenting the last few weeks of Christ's life told in an anachronistic manner.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@cs.uq.oz.au>
Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.::mystic80
Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam, but in doing so gets implicated in his wife's murder.::grantss
San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is on the trail of vigilante Police Officers who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.::<jgp3553@yahoo.com>

fields.movie_title: Now Where Did the Seventh Company Get to?
fields.plot: 1940: During the chaotic running fights of the French army the 7th company disappears - nobody knows they've been taken captive. Only their scouting patrol, three witty but lazy guys, can escape and now wanders around behind the German lines. They'd like to just stay out the fights, but a Lieutenant urges them to use a captured truck to break through to their troops.::Tom Zoerner <Tom.Zoerner@informatik.uni-erlangen.de>
A small-time hood tries to keep the peace between his friend Johnny and Johnny's creditors.::Rob Wright
A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.::Gabe Taverney (duke1029@aol.com)

During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.::MisterWilliamTell
An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.::Kenneth Chisholm
A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.::Kenneth Chisholm
A nightmarish futuristic fantasy about the controlling power of big corporations and an innocent cop who stumbles on the truth.::yusufpiskin
Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.::grantss
A young Parisian woman meets a middle-aged American businessman who demands their clandestine relationship be based only on sex.::Matt Patay
Two disparate people have a wonderful romance, but their political views and convictions drive them apart.::Kenneth Chisholm
A puritan Police Sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl who the locals claim never existed.
A recently widowed woman is on the road with her precocious young son, determined to make a new life for herself as a singer.::Christoph Stappert
A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.::Daniel Jos. Leary
A lonely widow meets a much younger Arab worker in a bar during a rainstorm. They fall in love, to their own surprise and to the outright shock of their families, colleagues, and drinking buddies.
In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.::Kenneth Chisholm

fields.movie_title: Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia
fields.plot: An American bar room pianist and his prostitute girlfriend go on a trip through the Mexican underworld to collect a bounty on the head of a dead gigolo.::Jojo Mac
A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.::Anonymous
A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that the couple he is spying on will be murdered.::<jgp3553@excite.com>
The Russian army sends an explorer on an expedition to the snowy Siberian wilderness where he makes friends with a seasoned local hunter.::Daniel Jos. Leary
A good-natured but unlucky Italian is constantly going on a difficult situations, but never lose his mood.
A ruthless editor tries to get his top reporter to cover one more crime story before retirement.
The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.::Kenneth Chisholm
In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.::Samovarkov

fields.movie_title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
fields.plot: King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>

A disfigured composer sells his soul for the woman he loves so that she will perform his music. However, an evil record tycoon betrays him and steals his music to open his rock palace, The Paradise.::<crow_steve@hotmail.com>

fields.movie_title: The Return of the Pink Panther
fields.plot: Inspector Jacque Clouseau (Peter Sellers) is put on the case when the Pink Panther diamond is stolen, with the Phantom's trademark glove the only clue.::Tom Benton

fields.movie_title: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three
fields.plot: In New York, armed men hijack a subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. Even if it's paid, how could they get away?::Anonymous
Two siblings and three of their friends en route to visit their grandfather's grave in Texas fall victim to a family of cannibalistic psychopaths.::ahmetkozan
With the help of an irreverent young sidekick, a bank robber gets his old gang back together to organize a daring new heist.::<jgp3553@yahoo.com>
At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out that threatens to destroy the tower and everyone in it.::Kenneth Chisholm
Although wife and mother Mabel is loved by her husband Nick, her mental illness places a strain on the marriage.::claire tailyour

An American grandson of the infamous scientist, struggling to prove that his grandfather was not as insane as people believe, is invited to Transylvania, where he discovers the process that reanimates a dead body.::Anonymous & Andreea D

A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.::Chris Makrozahopoulos <makzax@hotmail.com>
Four inseparable friends try to face their midlife crisis with daytrips and pranks at the expense of their families and the people around them.::sgt_pepper91
An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.::Anonymous

Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.
A group of indomitable Gauls are challenged by Roman Emperor Julius Caesar to accomplish twelve impossible tasks.::Michael Zink
"Popeye" Doyle travels to Marseille to find Alain Charnier, the drug smuggler who eluded him in New York.::Ian Pugh <skypilot@ptd.net>

fields.movie_title: The Man Who Would Be King
fields.plot: Two British former soldiers decide to set themselves up as Kings in Kafiristan, a land where no white man has set foot since Alexander the Great.::alfiehitchie

fields.movie_title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
fields.plot: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.::ahmetkozan

During a rural summer picnic, a few students and a teacher from an Australian girls' school vanish without a trace. Their absence frustrates and haunts the people left behind.::Spec81 <faeries_child@hotmail.com>
A jazz pianist and a wisecracking journalist are pulled into a complex web of mystery after the former witnesses the brutal murder of a psychic.
A newly-engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must seek shelter at the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-n-Furter.::Kenneth Chisholm
The epic tale of a class struggle in twentieth century Italy, as seen through the eyes of two childhood friends on opposing sides.

Charles Duchemin, a well-known gourmet and the publisher of a famous restaurant guide, is waging a war against fast-food entrepreneur Tricatel to save the French art of cooking. After having agreed to appear on a talk show to show his skills in naming food and wine by taste, he is confronted with two disasters: his son wants to become a clown rather than a restaurant tester and he, the famous Charles Duchemin, has lost his taste.::Robert Zeithammel <zeit@cip.physik.uni-muenchen.de>

An unlikely partnership between a Highway Patrol Officer, two criminals and a station secretary is formed to defend a defunct Los Angeles precinct office against a siege by a bloodthirsty street gang.::chasedaniels
An aging, down-on-his-luck ex-minor leaguer coaches a team of misfits in an ultra-competitive California little league.::<jgp3553@excite.com>

Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.::tanm_86

fields.movie_title: The House of the Laughing Windows
fields.plot: Stefano, a young restorer, is commissioned to save a controversial mural located in the church of a small, isolated village.::Class Cannibale
An attempted robbery turns to be an unexpected recruitment when two unemployed men mistakenly break into a police office instead of a store.::Anonymous

San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan must foil a terrorist organization made up of disgruntled Vietnam veterans. But this time, he's teamed with female partner Inspector Kate Moore, with whom he's not too excited to be working.::<jgp3553@yahoo.com>
Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.::unknown
A phony psychic/con artist and her taxi driver/private investigator boyfriend encounter a pair of serial kidnappers while trailing a missing heir in California.::Anonymous

Bruno Fioretti, known as "Mandrake", is an inveterate gambler who never misses a day at the horse racing track in Rome. He is always at the track together with his friends Armando Pellicci, known as "Er Pomata" cause his use of hair gel, and Felice. They always bet on the wrong horses and they always end up being penniless.::Wikipedia
A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.::mystic80
A police officer in the future uncovers the deadly secret behind a society that worships youth.
A history student becomes caught in the middle of a dangerous international plot involving Nazis, stolen jewels, and government agents.
This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.::nufs68
Five famous literary detective characters and their sidekicks are invited to a bizarre mansion to solve an even stranger mystery.::Kenneth Chisholm
