A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.::Kenneth Chisholm <kchishol@mnsi.net> and Brian McInnis
Mysterious deaths surround an American ambassador. Could the child that he is raising actually be the Antichrist? The Devil's own son?::Martin Johnstone
Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.::<jgp3553@excite.com>

Charles Dreyfus (Herbert Lom), who has finally cracked over Inspector Jacques Clouseau's (Peter Sellers') antics, escapes from a mental institution and launches an elaborate plan to get rid of Clouseau once and for all.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.::Kenneth Chisholm
The frustrating adventures of a humble employee who spends all of his time fulfilling the wishes and desires of his bosses.::Volker Boehm
A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.::Anonymous

A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.::Kenneth Chisholm
Alvy Singer, a divorced Jewish comedian, reflects on his relationship with ex-lover Annie Hall, an aspiring nightclub singer, which ended abruptly just like his previous marriages.

Black Sunday is the powerful story of a Black September terrorist group attempting to blow up a Goodyear blimp hovering over the Super Bowl stadium with 80,000 people and the president of the United States in attendance.
Operation Market Garden, September 1944: The Allies attempt to capture several strategically important bridges in the Netherlands in the hope of breaking the German lines.::GusF

fields.movie_title: We All Loved Each Other So Much
fields.plot: Three partisans bound by a strong friendship return home after the war, but the clash with everyday reality puts a strain on their bond.::sgt_pepper91
Recounted in flashback are the romantic perils of Mathieu, a middle-aged French sophisticate as he falls for his nineteen-year-old former chambermaid Conchita.::Jonathan Hayward

fields.movie_title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
fields.plot: Roy Neary, an electric lineman, watches how his quiet and ordinary daily life turns upside down after a close encounter with a UFO.::Chockys

France, 1801. Due to a minor, perceived slight mild-mannered Lieutenant d'Hubert is forced into a duel with the hot-headed, irrational Lieutenant Feraud. The disagreement ultimately results in scores of duels, spanning several years.::grantss

A hard but mediocre cop is assigned to escort a prostitute into custody from Las Vegas to Phoenix, so that she can testify in a mob trial. But a lot of people are literally betting that they won't make it into town alive.::<jgp3553@yahoo.com>
Two neighbors, a persecuted journalist and a resigned housewife, meet during Hitler's visit to Italy in May 1938.::alogigi

fields.movie_title: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
fields.plot: In this collection of animated shorts based on the stories and characters by A.A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh, a honey-loving teddy bear, embarks on some eccentric adventures.::Kenneth Chisholm
Two mice of the Rescue Aid Society search for a little girl kidnapped by unscrupulous treasure hunters.::Kenneth Chisholm

Anxious about his future after high school, a 19-year-old Italian-American from Brooklyn tries to escape the harsh reality of his bleak family life by dominating the dance floor at the local disco.::Kenneth Chisholm
A failing ice hockey team finds success with outrageously violent hockey goonery.::Kenneth Chisholm
The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor-trailer full of beer over state lines, in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.::Christopher D. Ryan <cryan@direct.ca> / edited by Rob
Four unfortunate men from different parts of the globe agree to risk their lives transporting gallons of nitroglycerin across dangerous Latin American jungle.::Anonymous
James Bond investigates the hijacking of British and Russian submarines carrying nuclear warheads, with the help of a K.G.B. agent whose lover he killed.::Helltopay27

fields.movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
fields.plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.::Trance
The staff of a New York City taxicab company go about their job while they dream of greater things.::Kenneth Chisholm
A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>

When the first manned flight to Mars is deemed unsafe and scrubbed on the launch pad, anxious authorities must scramble to save face and retain their funding - and so an unthinkable plot to fake the mission is hatched.
A hot-tempered farm laborer convinces the woman he loves to marry their rich but dying boss so that they can have a claim to his fortune.::<jgp3553@yahoo.com>
An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
A getaway driver becomes the latest assignment for a tenacious detective.::Will S

Good girl Sandy Olsson and greaser Danny Zuko fell in love over the summer. When they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?::jgp3553@yahoo.com
Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.::ahmetkozan
A married daughter who longs for her mother's love is visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist.::Anonymous
Three sisters find their lives spinning out of control in the wake of their parents' sudden, unexpected divorce.::Anonymous

When strange seeds drift to earth from space, mysterious pods begin to grow and invade San Francisco, California, where they replicate the residents into emotionless automatons one body at a time.::thirteenways

After his fishing boat is "periscoped", ex US footballer Bulldozer docks in an Italian port, where local criminals and American soldiers fight each other. Locals discover Bulldozer's talents and challenge the Yanks to a football game.::Scott Filtenborg
Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.::Kazuhiro Sawabe
At a 1962 college, Dean Vernon Wormer is determined to expel the entire Delta Tau Chi Fraternity, but those troublemakers have other plans for him.::Kenneth Chisholm
The navy's detective gets his brother, the ex-gambler to help him liquidate an illegal gaming house on a yacht near Miami.
When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.
A man studies kung fu at the Shaolin Temple to fight back against the oppressive Manchu government.::TompaDompa

An orphan who has been raised at a kung fu school, where he is treated as little more than a dogsbody and practice target for the students, has a life-changing experience after helping an old peripatetic beggar.::Added by A.J. Thousand
An alien orphan is sent from his dying planet to Earth, where he grows up to become his adoptive home's first and greatest superhero.::Kenneth Chisholm
Two stoners unknowingly smuggle a van - made entirely of marijuana - from Mexico to L.A., with incompetent Sgt. Stedenko on their trail.::<jgp3553@excite.com>
Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.
A lawyer is forced to defend a guilty judge, while defending other innocent clients, and trying to find punishment for the guilty and provide justice for the innocent.

After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.::dimakorou
Director/choreographer Bob Fosse tells his own life story as he details the sordid career of Joe Gideon, a womanizing, drug-using dancer.::Ray Hamel <hamel@primate.wisc.edu>
A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.::Noah Orent
A simpleminded, sheltered gardener becomes an unlikely trusted advisor to a powerful businessman and an insider in Washington politics.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
In 1924, Oskar Matzerath is born in the Free City of Danzig. At age three, he falls down a flight of stairs and stops growing. In 1939, World War II breaks out.::TompaDompa
Eight tourists who met in a holiday camp on the Ivory Coast are reunited for a skiing holiday.::Anonymous
A man tries to uncover an unconventional psychologist's therapy techniques on his institutionalized wife, amidst a series of brutal murders.::Matt Patay and Ben Cheshire
A reporter finds what appears to be a cover-up of safety hazards at a nuclear power plant.::Anonymous

Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possible successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.::Keith Francis

England, 1850s. A master criminal aims to rob a train of a large sum of gold. Security is incredibly tight and the task seems an impossible one. However, he has a plan and just the right people to carry it out.::grantss

Claude Bukowski leaves the family ranch in Oklahoma for New York where he is rapidly embraced into the hippie group of youngsters led by Berger, yet he's already been drafted. He soon falls in love with Sheila Franklin, a rich girl but still a rebel inside.::Raymond Clay <banquosa@concentric.net>

In Africa, 2 expat "brothers" are usually at each other's throats but now have a common enemy. Ormond's men are shooting or catching much of the wildlife for export as well as forcing the locals off their land. Lots of fun fights follow.::Scott Filtenborg
A simpleminded, sheltered country boy suddenly decides to leave his family home to experience life in the big city, where his naivete is both his best friend and his worst enemy.::Anonymous

Ted Kramer's wife leaves him, allowing for a lost bond to be rediscovered between Ted and his son, Billy. But a heated custody battle ensues over the divorced couple's son, deepening the wounds left by the separation.
Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
Arizona cop is sent to Switzerland to bring in the girlfriend of a dangerous mobster so she can testify against him. The mobster sends someone too - assassins.::Anonymous
While touring in Italy, a recently-widowed American opera singer has an incestuous relationship with her 15-year-old son to help him overcome his heroin addiction.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.::Daniel Williamson
Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.::Kenneth Chisholm
Count Dracula moves from Transylvania to Wismar, spreading the Black Plague across the land. Only a woman pure of heart can bring an end to his reign of horror.::anonymous
A teenage boy and his friends face off against a mysterious grave robber known only as the Tall Man, who keeps a lethal arsenal of terrible weapons with him.::<crow_steve@hotmail.com>
Rocky struggles in family life after his bout with Apollo Creed, while the embarrassed champ insistently goads him to accept a challenge for a rematch.::Kenneth Chisholm
A chimney sweep and a shepherdess seek to escape from the clutches of a tyrannical king.::cupcakes

A dashing thief, his gang of desperadoes and an intrepid policeman struggle to free a princess from an evil count's clutches, and learn the hidden secret to a fabulous treasure that she holds part of a key to.::Kenneth Chisholm
Carlo Verdone plays a multitude of characters, including a bully, a priest, a hippie and an anxiogenous man.::sgt_pepper91
A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.::Karl Krejci

In the near future, a charismatic leader summons the street gangs of New York City in a bid to take it over. When he is killed, The Warriors are falsely blamed and now must fight their way home while every other gang is hunting them down.

Wong Fei-Hung (Jackie Chan) is a mischievous, yet righteous young man, but after a series of incidents, his frustrated father has him disciplined by Beggar So (Siu-Tin Yuen), a Master of drunken martial arts.::Scott Napier
Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.::Anonymous
A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.::gamergcfan
A psycho-physiologist experiments with drugs and a sensory-deprivation tank and has visions he believes are genetic memories.

A grouchy farmer, known around his small Italian town as being wonderful to his employees, but actively driving everyone else away, is in for a surprise when a beautiful girl from the city, ends up on his stoop after her car breaks down in the rain.
Jake Blues, just released from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and his brother Elwood were raised.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
The new warden of a small prison farm in Arkansas tries to clean it up of corruption after initially posing as an inmate.::Anonymous

After the death of his wife and daughter in a car crash, a music professor staying at an old mansion is dragged into a decades-old mystery by an inexplicable presence in the mansion's attic.::Mystic80

Juan, a journalist, has always with him a tape recorder in which he records the interviews he does without judging them, an assessment that he leaves to his boss and friend, Paco. While he falls in love with Carmen, daughter of Luis, whom he tries to interview in prison, he interviews Clara, the beautiful wife of Paco.
In occupied Paris, an actress married to a Jewish theater owner must keep him hidden from the Nazis while doing both of their jobs.::Anonymous
A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.::myl

A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous façade, there is revealed a person of kindness, intelligence and sophistication.::Chris White

fields.movie_title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
fields.plot: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.::Trance & Travis Brainerd
An unearthly fog rolls into a small coastal town exactly 100 years after a ship mysteriously sank in its waters.
A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.::Q. Leo Rahman
A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.::Daniel Jos. Leary
The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father, and the guilt-ridden younger son.::LVJeff
The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.::bdsproductons

Gaetano, a young Neapolitan, decides to leave home, work and friends, to look for other moments of life and meet other people. He goes to Florence, to his aunt's home. In a clinic, where he goes by chance, he meets Martha and falls in love with her. After a series of funny situations (an old friend from the relentless chatter coming from Naples and the mature aunt and her elderly lover, a young American priest who wants to involve him in his visits to evangelical force, the encounter with Riccardino, a young man frustrated by an oppressive mother and the father waiting for the miracle of re-growth of an amputated hand, etc.) Gaetano decides to stay in Florence and to act as father to Martha's incoming son, even if the girl does not want to disclose the exact name of the father .::Ruben Oliveira
A scientist sends a man with extraordinary psychic powers to hunt others like him.::Anonymous

A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.::Helltopay27
A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.::Joyce Kavitsky <Kavitsky@erols.com>
While attending a retrospective of his work, a filmmaker recalls his life and his loves: the inspirations for his films.::Anonymous
Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to start a relationship with Lois Lane, unaware that three Kryptonian criminals he inadvertently released are conquering Earth.::Kenneth Chisholm
Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>

A man is living happily on an island with his family, growing bananas. When a local mobster with an eye on man's property tries to take it from him, he must go to the town for the first time to get some help.::Anonymous
On election day, three Italians travel to their home town to vote.::sgt_pepper91
A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.::Anonymous
In the midst of a searing Florida heat wave, a woman persuades her lover, a small-town lawyer, to murder her rich husband.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A former summer camp caretaker, horribly burned from a prank gone wrong, lurks around an upstate New York summer camp bent on killing the teenagers responsible for his disfigurement.::Matt Patay
Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew, and the other a devout Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics.::Kenneth Chisholm

A teen girl in 1970's Berlin becomes addicted to heroin. Everything in her life slowly begins to distort and disappear as she befriends a small crew of junkies and falls in love with a drug-abusing male prostitute.::DC
A daughter of a millionaire, distinguish by incredible bad luck, goes missing. The idea how to find her is either insane or brilliant - to send after her an equally unlucky person.

A young boy, Conan, becomes a slave after his parents are killed and tribe destroyed by a savage warlord and sorcerer, Thulsa Doom. When he grows up he becomes a fearless, invincible fighter. Set free, he plots revenge against Thulsa Doom.::grantss
A young woman inherits an old hotel in Louisiana where, following a series of supernatural "accidents", she learns that the building was built over one of the entrances to Hell.::Matt Patay

A high-school student's love for a 15-year-old girl is thwarted by parental disapproval, circumstance, and accident; he burns down her family's house and is committed to a psychiatric hospital.::Anonymous
In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.::Kenneth Chisholm
A little fox named Tod, and Copper, a hound puppy, vow to be best buddies forever. But as Copper grows into a hunting dog, their unlikely friendship faces the ultimate test.
Two Australian sprinters face the brutal realities of war when they are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign in Turkey during World War I.::Kenneth Chisholm
This story takes place in prehistoric time when three tribesmen search for a new fire source.::Christopher D. Ryan <cryan@direct.ca>

fields.movie_title: History of the World: Part I
fields.plot: Mel Brooks brings his one-of-a-kind comic touch to the history of mankind covering events from the Old Testament to the French Revolution in a series of episodic comedy vignettes.::Anonymous
In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.::Kenneth Chisholm (kchishol@mnsi.net)
A mischievous nobleman and his poor doppelganger get into serious troubles when a practical joke endangers the Pope.
Two old friends meet for dinner; as one tells anecdotes detailing his experiences, the other notices their differing worldviews.

Norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter Chelsea. At Golden Pond, he and his wife nevertheless agree to care for Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.
A woman starts exhibiting increasingly disturbing behavior after asking her husband for a divorce. Suspicions of infidelity soon give way to something much more sinister.::Samovarkov

fields.movie_title: Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Ark
fields.plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.::Colin Tinto <cst@imdb.com>
A radical American journalist becomes involved with the Communist revolution in Russia, and hopes to bring its spirit and idealism to the United States.::<jgp3553@yahoo.com>
An ace safe cracker wants to do one last big heist for the mob before going straight.

As allied P.O.W.s prepare for a soccer game against the German National Team to be played in Nazi-occupied Paris, the French Resistance and British officers are making plans for the team's escape.::jgp3553@yahoo.com

The four old friends meet on the grave of the fifth of them, Perozzi, who died at the end of the first episode. Time has passed but they are still up for adventures and cruel jokes, and while they recall the one they created together with the late friend, new ones are on their way, starting right there at the cemetery.::Alessio F. Bragadini <alessio@post.com>
A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space, and have returned to Earth to find their creator.::Colin Tinto <cst@imdb.com>

Sergio Benvenuti finds job as musical agent in an important Italian publisher. This could be his final step before to marry Rossella. But his career does not rise, so he asks Nadia Vandelli, a more experienced agent and a nice girl, to work together just for one day, in order to gain some more experience. They have to meet Manuel Fantoni in his own flat. Nadia is late and Sergio goes on with the meeting. Fantoni isn't what he says he is and Nadia is arriving. Everything starts rolling quickly and quickly till Sergio finds himself in an incredible and funny situation from which it will be hard to escape.::1felco
A young woman's sexual awakening brings horror when she discovers her urges transform her into a monstrous black leopard.::Lammastide
On another planet in the distant past, a Gelfling embarks on a quest to find the missing shard of a magical crystal, and so restore order to his world.::Chris White
A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.::rball4042
Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.::Adam Pierson

Trying to find how a millionaire wound up with a phony diamond brings Hercule Poirot (Sir Peter Ustinov) to an exclusive island resort frequented by the rich and famous. When a murder is committed, everyone has an alibi.::Erewhon
Two young Swedish children experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.::Karl Krejci
A group of Southern California high school students are enjoying their most important subjects: sex, drugs, and rock n' roll.::Movie Guy
A veteran Green Beret is forced by a cruel Sheriff and his deputies to flee into the mountains and wage an escalating one-man war against his pursuers.::Kenneth Chisholm
The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.::Raymond Spum
The life of the lawyer who became the famed leader of the Indian revolts against the British rule through his philosophy of nonviolent protest.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A beautiful unicorn sets out to learn if she truly is the last of her kind in this sparkling animated musical.
When an idealistic American writer disappears during the Chilean coup d'état in September 1973, his wife and father try to find him.::(duke1029@aol.com)
A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.::Mark
A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.::Kenneth Chisholm
A family's home is haunted by a host of demonic ghosts.::Kenneth Chisholm

Two neurotics, working for a suicide hotline on the night of Christmas Eve, get caught up in a catastrophe when a pregnant woman, her abusive boyfriend, and a transvestite visit their office.::Charlie Wittke
After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.::Naz Al-Nassar
To save her ill son, a field mouse must seek the aid of a colony of rats, with whom she has a deeper link than she ever suspected.::Kenneth Chisholm
Sophie is the survivor of Nazi concentration camps, who has found a reason to live with Nathan, a sparkling if unsteady American Jew obsessed with the Holocaust.

fields.movie_title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
fields.plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.::Trance
A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.::ahmetkozan
Michael Dorsey, an unsuccessful actor, disguises himself as a woman in order to get a role on a trashy hospital soap.
A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.::Anonymous
A struggling female soprano finds work playing a male female impersonator, but it complicates her personal life.::Kenneth Chisholm
A struggling young writer finds his life and work dominated by his unfaithful wife and his radical feminist mother, whose best-selling manifesto turns her into a cultural icon.::Jojo Max

Fighting against pirates at the turn of the 20th century, the Hong Kong navy are failing miserably. It's up to Sergeant Lung (Jackie Chan) to take matters into his own hands.::Michael Crew <m.crew@bbcnc.org.uk>

Michele is a mathematics professor who just started a new job in a school with some peculiar teaching methods. After a woman in his neighborhood is murdered, Michele meets beautiful colleague Bianca, and a relationship begins between the two. Where is this relationship heading, and will Michele be able to help the police catch the murderer?::hoshiyomi
A group of seven former college friends gather for a week-end reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>

fields.movie_title: Who Finds a Friend Finds a Treasure
fields.plot: On a small pacific island, Alan and Charlie try to find a war treasure left behind by the Japanese army in World War II.::Michael Zink
A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.::Kenneth Chisholm
In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that a Red Ryder BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
The effects of a devastating nuclear holocaust on small-town residents of eastern Kansas.::J. Boyd <tisland@japan-net.or.jp>
A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
Eddie Murphy's raunchy, raucous stand-up comedy routine is captured for posterity on this tape.::Afterburner <aburner@erols.com>
Two men meet each other in a strange situation and end up being mistaken for robbers first, for secret service agents later.::Anonymous

Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.::Jesse Miller
An American oil company has plans for a new refinery and sends someone to Scotland to buy up an entire village, but things don't go as expected.::Anonymous
During WWII, a British colonel tries to bridge the cultural divides between a British POW and the Japanese camp commander in order to avoid bloodshed.::Samovarkov
The classic Disney animated characters play the roles in this animated retelling of the Charles Dickens masterpiece.::Kenneth Chisholm
The comedy team takes a look at life in all of its stages in their own uniquely silly way.::Kenneth Chisholm
The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.::Kenneth Chisholm
A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy to research the life of an 18th-century composer.
The rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, only heats up when one gang member kills a member of the other.
Bourdelle, a family of musicians, refuse to play for Germans during the war. They would like to liberate France using all possible means.::Film Critic Lalit Rao (FIPRESCI)

fields.movie_title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
fields.plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.::Tom Benton & Travis Brainerd
Rusty James, an absent-minded street thug struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days when gang warfare was going on.::anonymous
In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.::mgx
Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.
A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.::Anonymous
A programmer at a TV station that specializes in adult entertainment searches for the producers of a dangerous and bizarre broadcast.
A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.::Anonymous
"Documentary" about a man who can look and act like whoever he's around, and meets various famous people.::Anonymous
A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery, and H.A.L.::Kenneth Chisholm
A school janitor pretends to be a priest in order to give private lessons to a young top model.::sgt_pepper91
A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.::Colin Tinto <cst@imdb.com>
The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.
A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.::Anonymous
After two friends return home from the Vietnam War one becomes mentally unstable and obsesses with becoming a bird.::Daniel Jos. Leary

The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.::yusufpiskin
A young actor's obsession with spying on a beautiful woman who lives nearby leads to a baffling series of events with drastic consequences.::David Rush
In his attempts to reconcile a lounge singer with his mistress, a hapless talent agent is mistaken as her lover by a jealous gangster.::Anonymous
Although they live married lives, two strangers keep running into each other, starting a friendship that could blossom into so much more.::wrstevenson
Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.::Anonymous
A young man inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.::Kenneth Chisholm

fields.movie_title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
fields.plot: In 1935, Indiana Jones arrives in India, still part of the British Empire, and is asked to find a mystical stone. He then stumbles upon a secret cult committing enslavement and human sacrifices in the catacombs of an ancient palace.::Jwelch5742
A martial arts master agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager.::Anonymous

fields.movie_title: Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
fields.plot: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.::Garth Ellis
A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody 'Year Zero' cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million 'undesirable' civilians.::Jojo Mac
A middle-aged unknown comes seemingly out of nowhere to become a legendary baseball player with almost supernatural talent.::Kenneth Chisholm
The monstrous spirit of a slain child murderer seeks revenge by invading the dreams of teenagers whose parents were responsible for his untimely death.::Dynasti Noble
In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

fields.movie_title: Nothing Left to Do but Cry
fields.plot: In the 80s, two friends misteriously wake up in the XV century and clumsly try to intermingle with the society of the time.::sgt_pepper91

fields.movie_title: Once Upon a Time in America
fields.plot: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.::wsjacobs@gmail.com
Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.::Anonymous
A young girl, with an amazing ability to communicate with insects, is transferred to an exclusive Swiss boarding school, where her unusual capability might help solve a string of murders.::J. D'Andra
A man is forced to completely change his habits when he decides to move from the country to the city.::Anonymous

A young punk recruited by a car repossession agency finds himself in pursuit of a Chevrolet Malibu that is wanted for a $20,000 bounty - and has something otherworldly stashed in its trunk.::tanglefreak98
A mousy romance novelist sets off for Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure hunting for treasure with a mercenary rogue.::Anonymous
A girl's "sweet" sixteenth birthday becomes anything but special, as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and makes her drive him across the country. The government tries to stop them.::Anonymous
A New Yorker's life is thrown into a tailspin when his younger cousin surprise-visits him, starting a strange, unpredictable adventure.::Will S
A mercenary is hired to rescue his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.::<crow_steve@hotmail.com>

A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.::vsuperkuns
Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.::Gary Keuma
A night at the movies turns into a nightmare when Michael and his date are attacked by a hoard of bloodthirsty zombies - only a "Thriller" can save them now.::Tomius J. Barnard
Parody of WWII spy movies in which an American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.::Anonymous

After his girlfriend ditches him for a boorish ski jock, Lane decides that suicide is the only answer. However, his increasingly inept attempts bring him only more agony and embarrassment. Filled with the wildest teen nightmares.
A bureaucrat in a dystopic society becomes an enemy of the state as he pursues the woman of his dreams.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.::A. Nonymous

Six guests are anonymously invited to a strange mansion for dinner, but after their host is killed, they must cooperate with the staff to identify the murderer as the bodies pile up.::Kenneth Chisholm
A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

As the world is overrun by zombies, a small group of scientists and military personnel dwelling in an underground bunker in Florida must determine whether they should educate, eliminate or escape the undead horde.::tanglefreak98
During a long space war, the lives of two wounded enemies become dependent on their ability to forgive and to trust.

Irwin M. "Fletch" Fletcher is a newspaper reporter being offered a large sum to off a cancerous millionaire, but is on the run, risking his job and finding clues when it's clear the man is healthy.::sheldonandres
A teenager discovers that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire, so he turns to an actor in a television horror show for help dealing with the undead.::Dynasti Noble
A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.::Captain Chunk
A virtuous Hong Kong Police Officer must clear his good name when the drug lord he is after frames him for the murder of a dirty cop.::Daniel Jos. Leary

The thief Gaston escapes the dungeon of medieval Aquila through the latrine. Soldiers are about to kill him when Navarre saves him. Navarre, traveling with his spirited hawk, plans to kill the bishop of Aquila with help from Gaston.::Scott Filtenborg
In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
A mysterious preacher (Clint Eastwood) protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
In New Jersey in 1935, a movie character walks off the screen and into the real world.::Anonymous

In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.::grantss
After an odd new medical student arrives on campus, a dedicated local and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue.::Tom Benton

Teenage geniuses deal with their abilities while developing a high-powered laser for a university project. When their professor intends to turn their work into a military weapon, they decide to ruin his plans.::Lordship <lordship@juno.com>

Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.::Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.::Greg Bole <bole@life.bio.sunysb.edu>

fields.movie_title: To Live and Die in L.A.
fields.plot: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
A young girl requests the help of a vampire hunter to kill the vampire who has bitten her, and thus prevent her from becoming a vampire herself.::Christopher E. Meadows <cmeadows@nyx.cs.du.edu>
When a young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder, policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A police detective cracks down on organized crime in Chinatown after the murders of Triad and Mafia leaders.::Anonymous
When assorted people start having inexplicable delusions that lead to their deaths, a teenage Sherlock Holmes decides to investigate.::Kenneth Chisholm
A high-strung and cynical man's life is never the same when his naive but good-natured cousin comes to America to live with him.::Kenneth Chisholm
A lackadaisical handyman and aspiring novelist tries to support his younger girlfriend as she slowly succumbs to madness.::Jojo Mac

Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.
While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.::Kenneth Chisholm

The diminutive Asterix and his rather larger companion Obelix, warriors of the last village in Gaul still free after the Roman invasion, set out on a mission to deliver a barrel of their druid's famous magic potion to help Asterix's cousin in Britain fight off the invading Roman army.::Benjamin John Evans <benj@whitley.unimelb.edu.au>
A rough-and-tumble trucker helps rescue his friend's fiancée from an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.::MadMovieManiac

The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.::Nicolé Lunge
Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
Two men are framed and sent to jail, where they meet a murderer who helps them escape and leave the state.::Sameir Ali
A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.::Kenneth Chisholm
In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.::Jim Thomas
A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.::Anonymous
Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.::Kenneth Chisholm
Between two Thanksgivings two years apart, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.::Anonymous

Hard-nosed, hard-living Marine Gunnery Sergeant Tom Highway (Clint Eastwood) clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".::Kenneth Chisholm
A young man who escapes the clutches of a murderous hitchhiker is subsequently stalked by the hitcher and framed for his crimes.::Helltopay27
A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.::Kenneth Chisholm
After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.::Karl Krejci
A greedy landowner and his backward nephew conspire to block the only water source for an adjoining property in order to bankrupt the owner and force him to sell.::Gabe Taverney (duke1029@aol.com)
A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.::Kenneth Chisholm
Asian Hawk (Jackie Chan) and his bumbling sidekick are sent on a quest through Europe to find a mysterious treasure held by a shadowy organization of monks.::Nizam Ahmed <cs41na@surrey.ac.uk>
Former FBI profiler Will Graham returns to service to pursue a deranged serial killer dubbed "the Tooth Fairy" by the media.::David
A beautiful but shy shepherdess plots vengeance on the men whose greedy conspiracy to acquire her father's land caused his death years earlier.::Gabe Taverney (duke1029@aol.com)
Eighteenth-century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.::Kenneth Chisholm
Alien brain parasites, entering humans through the mouth, turn their host into a killing zombie. Some teenagers start to fight against them.::Soeren Ney <SoerenNey@AOL.COM>
At the dawn of World War III, a man searches for a way to restore peace to the world and finds he must give something in return.::Karl Krejci

Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.::yusufpiskin
A poor girl must choose between the affections of dating her childhood sweetheart or a rich but sensitive playboy.::Jojo Mac

Lucy meets George in a Florence pensione and the two share a brief romance before Lucy returns home, where she becomes engaged to Cecil. However, it isn't long before George unexpectedly enters her life again.::Scott Filtenborg
A couple, cheated by a vile businessman, kidnap his wife in retaliation, without knowing that their enemy is delighted they did.::Kenneth Chisholm
The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.
After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.::lisakoffler1967@gmail.com

fields.movie_title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
fields.plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.::Kenneth Chisholm
A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.::Kenneth Chisholm

As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.::Anonymous

The Autobots must stop a colossal planet consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.::Kenneth Chisholm
A reforming ex-gangster tries to reconcile with his estranged policeman brother, but the ties to his former gang are difficult to break.::LVJeff
A babysitter must battle her way through the big city after being stranded there with the kids she's looking after.

A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.::Harald Mayr <marvin@bike.augusta.de>

A French boarding school run by priests seems to be a haven from World War II until a new student arrives. He becomes the roommate of the top student in his class. Rivals at first, the roommates form a bond and share a secret.::Dale O'Connor <daleoc@interaccess.com>
During the late 19th century, a strict religious community in a Danish village takes in a French refugee from the Franco-Prussian War as a servant to the late pastor's daughters.::TompaDompa
Based on the life of successful poet Charles Bukowski and his exploits in Hollywood during the 60s, 70s, and 80s.::Bastion

"Bloodsport" follows Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, who decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.::ryzombie
A group of dated appliances embark on a journey to the city to find their master after being abandoned in a cabin in the woods.::Jonathan
Take two rival television reporters: one handsome, one talented, both male. Add one Producer, female. Mix well, and watch the sparks fly.
An outcast secretly pays the most popular girl in school one thousand dollars to pretend to be his girlfriend for a month.::Daniel Jos. Leary
Spending the summer at a Catskills resort with her family, Frances "Baby" Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor, Johnny Castle.::Michael Zink <m.zink@adg.de>
Eddie Murphy in a stand-up performance recorded live. For an hour and a half he talks about his favourite subjects: sex and women.::Mattias Thuresson <mattias.thuresson@mbox300.swipnet.se>
A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.::Kenneth Chisholm
The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.::Helltopay27
A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.::Kenneth Chisholm
A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.::matt-282
In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.::Kenneth Chisholm

A woman discovers the newly resurrected, partially formed, body of her brother-in-law. She starts killing for him to revitalize his body so he can escape the demonic beings that are pursuing him after he escaped their sadistic underworld.::Jojo Mac & Helltopay27

When their best friends announce that they're separating, a professor and his wife discover the faults in their own marriage.::Anonymous
