A boy develops a disease so rare that nobody is working on a cure, so his father decides to learn all about it and tackle the problem himself.::Anonymous
After hearing stories of her, a passenger on a cruise ship develops an irresistible infatuation with an eccentric paraplegic's wife.::Will S

Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam.::Kenneth Chisholm
A traveling mariachi is mistaken for a murderous criminal and must hide from a gang bent on killing him.::LVJeff
A self-centered Minnesota lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.::Daniel Jos. Leary
The Muppet characters tell their version of the classic tale of an old and bitter miser's redemption on Christmas Eve.::Kenneth Chisholm
Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.
A Hollywood studio executive is being sent death threats by a writer whose script he rejected, but which one?::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.::grantss
The story about two sons of a stern minister -- one reserved, one rebellious -- growing up in rural Montana while devoted to fly fishing.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
A prep school student needing money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.
With a serial strangler on the loose, a bookkeeper wanders around town searching for the vigilante group intent on catching the killer.::Anonymous
A security pro finds his past coming back to haunt him, when he and his unique team are tasked with retrieving a particularly important item.::mystic80

fields.movie_title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me
fields.plot: Laura Palmer's harrowing final days are chronicled one year after the murder of Teresa Banks, a resident of Twin Peaks' neighboring town.::Will McEwan
Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
Two slacker friends try to promote their public-access cable show.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
Two F.B.I. Agents, Fox Mulder the believer and Dana Scully the skeptic, investigate the strange and unexplained, while hidden forces work to impede their efforts.::Kenneth Chisholm
The Addams Family try to rescue their beloved Uncle Fester from his gold-digging new love, a black widow named Debbie.::Rob Hartill
A tale of nineteenth-century New York high society in which a young lawyer falls in love with a woman separated from her husband, while he is engaged to the woman's cousin.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
A Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.::Rob Hartill
A young New Yorker goes to Arizona where he finds freedom to both love and dream.::Will S
A sardonic hardware store clerk is accidentally transported to 1300 A.D., where he must retrieve the Necronomicon and battle an army of the dead so he can return home.::Adam Pierson
Two boys meet at an opera training school in Peking in 1924. Their resulting friendship will span nearly 70 years and will endure some of the most troublesome times in China's history.::grantss
Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.::Kenneth Chisholm <kchishol@mnsi.net>
A mentally ill young woman finds her love in an eccentric man who models himself after Buster Keaton.::Kenneth Chisholm
Based on the true life experiences of poet Jimmy Santiago Baca, the film focuses on step-brothers Paco and Cruz, and their bi-racial cousin Miklo.
A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.::Anonymous
When a Jamaican sprinter is disqualified from the Olympic Games, he enlists the help of a dishonored coach to start the first Jamaican Bobsled Team.::Josh Wunder
The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.::Woz <bcrash77@hotmail.com>
A fictionalized account of the life of the martial arts superstar.::Anonymous and assmn316
An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.::Kenneth Chisholm
A young lawyer joins a prestigious law firm only to discover that it has a sinister dark side.::Kenneth Chisholm

Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com> and assmn316
A young boy stays with his aunt and uncle and be friends with his cousin, a boy of the same age who shows increasing signs of violent and psychopathic behavior.::mystic80
A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.::Anonymous
An unhappy businessman finds a new sense of purpose after he's tasked with helping a quartet of ghosts fulfill their last wishes before moving on to the afterlife.::Jojo Mac
A curious youngster moves to Salem, where he struggles to fit in before awakening a trio of diabolical witches that were executed in the 17th century.::Dynasti Noble

A fun-loving American bulldog pup, a hilarious Himalayan cat, and a wise old golden retriever embark on a long trek through the rugged wilderness of the Sierra Nevada mountains in a quest to reach home and their beloved owners.
A rancher, his clairvoyant wife and their family face turbulent years in South America in this adaptation of Isabel Allende's best-seller.::Leo Logan
Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan (Clint Eastwood) couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>

fields.movie_title: In the Name of the Father
fields.plot: A man's coerced confession to an I.R.A. bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A teacher must deal with the underworld of Naples and the family problems of his students.::sgt_pepper91
A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.::steven-espinoza21
A middle-aged couple suspects foul play when their neighbor's wife suddenly drops dead.::Anonymous
A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.::Anonymous
After a bitter divorce, an actor disguises himself as a female housekeeper to spend time with his children held in custody by his former wife.::Kenneth Chisholm
Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>

Parallel tales of two sexually obsessed men, one hurting and annoying women physically and mentally, one wandering around the city talking to strangers and experiencing dimensions of life.::J. S. Golden
Jack Skellington, king of Halloween Town, discovers Christmas Town, but his attempts to bring Christmas to his home causes confusion.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>

A vagabond swordsman is aided by a beautiful ninja girl and a crafty spy in confronting a demonic clan of killers - with a ghost from his past as their leader - who are bent on overthrowing the Tokugawa Shogunate.::Chris Bejines and tanglefreak98

Kidnapped boy Phillip Perry (T.J. Lowther) strikes up a friendship with his captor Butch Haynes (Kevin Costner): an escaped convict on the run from the law, while the search is headed up by honorable Texas Ranger "Red" Garrett (Clint Eastwood).::mystic80
When a man with HIV is fired by his law firm because of his condition, he hires a homophobic small time lawyer as the only willing advocate for a wrongful dismissal suit.::Kenneth Chisholm

In the mid-19th century, a mute woman is sent to New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years leading up to World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty was to his lordly employer.::Joyce Kavitsky <Kavitsky@erols.com>
Rudy has always been told that he was too small to play college football. But he is determined to overcome the odds and fulfill his dream of playing for Notre Dame.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
In the summer of 1962, a new kid in town is taken under the wing of a young baseball prodigy and his rowdy team, resulting in many adventures.
In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.::Chris White
A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.::Kenneth Chisholm
A young, recently-orphaned girl is sent to England after living in India all of her life. Once there, she begins to explore her new, seemingly-isolated surroundings, and its secrets.::Will S
The day-to-day lives of several suburban Los Angeles residents.::Mark Logan <marklo@west.sun.com>
A recently widowed man's son calls a radio talk-show in an attempt to find his father a partner.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
Several yakuza from Tokyo are sent to Okinawa to help end a gang war. The war then escalates and the Tokyo drifters decide to lay low at the beach.::Erik Gregersen <erik@astro.as.utexas.edu>
The story about the relationship between a rebellious 1950s teenager and his abusive stepfather, based on the memoirs of writer and literature Professor Tobias Wolff.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.::Murray Chapman
A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com> and Brian McInnis

In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A medieval knight and his servant ask a familiar wizard to move them back in time to prevent father-in-law's accidentally killing. Instead, they fly away to the 20th century.
A young man in a small Midwestern town struggles to care for his mentally-disabled younger brother and morbidly obese mother while attempting to pursue his own happiness.::unknown

Wallace lets out his spare room to a penguin. The penguin and Gromit, Wallace's dog, immediately don't see eye-to-eye. Meanwhile, Wallace has invented a giant pair of robotic trousers, designed to take Gromit for walks.::grantss

fields.movie_title: The Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert
fields.plot: Two drag performers and a transgender woman travel across the desert to perform their unique style of cabaret.::owen9825
In New York in 1928, a struggling playwright is forced to cast a mobster's talentless girlfriend in his latest drama in order to get it produced.::Anonymous
Director Nanni Moretti takes a mordant look at Italian life through three antological vignettes presented as the chapters of an open diary.::sgt_pepper91
Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal server at a late-night restaurant he frequents.::Anonymous

A second-class horror movie has to be shown at Cannes Film Festival, but, before each screening, the projectionist is killed by a mysterious fellow, with hammer and sickle, just as it happens in the film to be shown.::Adalberto Fornario
A day in the lives of two convenience clerks named Dante and Randal as they annoy customers, discuss movies, and play hockey on the store roof.::<zrelmar@gmail.com>
A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.::Kenneth Chisholm
A political activist is convinced that her guest is a man who once tortured her for the government.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
A cemetery man must kill the dead a second time when they become zombies.::Lordship <lordship@juno.com>
A big-city reporter travels to the small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman that she works for as a maid.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams, despite his lack of talent.

The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.::ahmetkozan
Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.::Chris White
Two teenage girls share a unique bond; their parents, concerned that the friendship is too intense, separate them, and the girls take revenge.::Nate
A community of magical shape-shifting raccoon dogs struggle to prevent their forest home from being destroyed by urban development.::Kenneth Chisholm
A naive business graduate is installed as president of a manufacturing company as part of a stock scam.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>

The life and death of the legendary Ludwig van Beethoven. Besides all the work he is known for, the composer once wrote a famous love letter to a nameless beloved, and the movie tries to find out who this beloved was--not easy, as Beethoven has had many women in his life.::Smoothhoney1265

fields.movie_title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
fields.plot: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
In 1937, a Chinese martial artist returns to Shanghai to find his teacher dead and his school harassed by the Japanese.::Kenneth Chisholm
In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.::Anonymous
Alfalfa is wooing Darla and his "He-Man-Woman-Hating" friends attempt to sabotage the relationship.::Anonymous

Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.::Movie Guy
Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.::Rob Hartill
Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.::Anonymous
A young social outcast in Australia steals money from her parents to finance a vacation where she hopes to find happiness, and perhaps love.::TompaDompa
Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.::Kenneth Chisholm
A family descended from Maori warriors is bedeviled by a violent father and the societal problems of being treated as outcasts.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>

As a teen, Faith was told that her destiny is a man named Damon Bradley. Years later - Faith is about to marry another man - a Damon Bradley calls to wish them all the best. Faith blows off the wedding and follows Damon to Italy.::smoothhoney1265
The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.::ahmetkozan

Onoff is a famous writer who hasn't published any new books for quite some time and has become a recluse. When he is picked up by the police one stormy night, without any identification, out of breath and running madly, without clear memory of recent events, the Inspector is suspicious. Through interrogatory dialectic, the head of this lonely, isolated, broken-down police station tries to establish what has happened, by delving into the mind of his writer-hero, and clearing up a mysterious killing.::Tad Dibbern <DIBBERN_D@a1.mscf.upenn.edu>
A young lawyer, Richard Goodwin, investigates a potentially fixed game show. Charles Van Doren, a big time show winner, is under Goodwin's investigation.

Young Queen Margot finds herself trapped in an arranged marriage amidst a religious war between Catholics and Protestants. She hopes to escape with a new lover, but finds herself imprisoned by her powerful and ruthless family.::David Rush
Three friends discover their new flatmate dead but loaded with cash.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.::Carl Schultz
A young police officer must prevent a bomb exploding aboard a city bus by keeping its speed above 50 mph.::Chris White
A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>

A fearless, globe-trotting, terrorist-battling secret agent has his life turned upside down when he discovers his wife might be having an affair with a used-car salesman while terrorists smuggle nuclear war heads into the United States.::Skip_4591 and assmn316
After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
A young martial artist is caught between respecting his pacifist father's wishes or stopping a group of disrespectful foreigners from stealing precious artifacts.::Daniel Jos. Leary
From Wichita to Dodge City to the O.K. Corral in Tombstone, a man becomes a myth in this thrilling journey of romance, adventure and desperate, heroic action.

NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.::rball4042 (edited by BeaconSky)
Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.::watzdabigdeal and assmn316
An outcast Husky risks his life with other sled dogs to prevent a deadly epidemic from ravaging Nome, Alaska.::Anonymous
A teenager finds his dreams of becoming a basketball star threatened after he free falls into the harrowing world of drug addiction.::unknown
A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.::Daniel Williamson
Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.::Rob Hartill

A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.::paulrichard and assmn316
A scientist in a surrealist society kidnaps children to steal their dreams, hoping that they slow his aging process.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
Wallace's whirlwind romance with the owner of the local wool shop puts his head in a spin; Gromit is framed for sheep-rustling in a fiendish criminal plot.::Jwelch5742

Shallow, rich and socially successful Cher is at the top of her Beverly Hills high school's pecking scale. Seeing herself as a matchmaker, Cher first coaxes two teachers into dating each other.::Dynasti Noble
On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young First Officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy Captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.::Kenneth Chisholm
An ex-Marine turned teacher struggles to connect with her students in an inner city school.::Kenneth Chisholm
On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.::<jgp3553@excite.com>
A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>

Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.::rball4042
When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.::Official Source
This Hong Kong-set crime drama follows the lives of a hitman, hoping to get out of the business, and his elusive female partner.::Sonja Pavkovic

Bent on committing as many sins as possible to avert the birth of the beast, a Catholic priest teams up with a Black Metal aficionado and an Italian connoisseur of the occult. Now, he must become an unrelenting sinner. Is there still hope?::Nick Riganas

Twenty-four hours in the lives of the young employees at Empire Records when they all grow up and become young adults thanks to each other and the manager. They all face the store joining a chain store with strict rules.::Scott Filtenborg
It's Friday, and Craig and Smokey must come up with $200 they owe a local bully or there won't be a Saturday.

Years after a friend and fellow 00 agent is killed on a joint mission, a secret space based weapons program known as "GoldenEye" is stolen. James Bond sets out to stop a Russian crime syndicate from using the weapon.::vsuperkuns

When Max makes a preposterous promise to a girl he has a crush on, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.::Kenneth Chisholm
24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.
A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.::Daniel Jos. Leary
A young man visiting and helping his uncle in New York City finds himself forced to fight a street gang and the mob with his martial art skills.::Kenneth Chisholm
An insurance investigator begins discovering that the impact a horror writer's books have on his fans is more than inspirational.::MonkeyKingMA
A day in the life of a group of teens as they travel around New York City skating, drinking, smoking and deflowering virgins.::Radishes

Ben Sanderson, a Hollywood screenwriter who lost everything because of his alcoholism, arrives in Las Vegas to drink himself to death. There, he meets and forms an uneasy friendship and non-interference pact with prostitute Sera.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A young girl is relegated to servitude at a boarding school when her father goes missing and is presumed dead.::Kenneth Chisholm
Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.::Mystic80
When he discovers his adopted son is a genius, a New York sportswriter seeks out the boy's birth mother: a ditzy porn star and prostitute.
A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.::ReptilePatrol
A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.::Anonymous
A biographical story of former U.S. President Richard Nixon, from his days as a young boy, to his eventual Presidency, which ended in shame.::mystic80
Four 12-year-old girls grow up together during an eventful small-town summer in 1970.::Anonymous
An English soldier and the daughter of an Algonquin chief share a romance when English colonists invade seventeenth century Virginia.::Kenneth Chisholm and Brian McInnis
In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.::nufs68
Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.::ahmetkozan
Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A Brooklyn smoke shop is the center of neighborhood activity, and the stories of its customers.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A former cop turned street-hustler accidentally uncovers a conspiracy in Los Angeles in 1999.

fields.movie_title: Tales from the Crypt: Demon Knight
fields.plot: A man on the run is hunted by a demon known as the Collector.::<crow_steve@hotmail.com>

fields.movie_title: To Wong Foo Thanks for Everything, Julie Newmar
fields.plot: Three drag queens travel cross-country until their car breaks down, leaving them stranded in a small town.::Anonymous
After his auto-parts tycoon father dies, the overweight, underachieving son teams up with a snide accountant to try and save the family business.::Dynasti Noble
A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.::Kenneth Chisholm

Three half-brothers are reunited at their mother's funeral. After being told of their inheritance they quickly spend the money, only to find out that they will not receive it after all. The men grow closer while deciding how to proceed.::E. Merenda <ejm@chickmail.com>
In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.::Anonymous
A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.::Skip_4591

Three intertwined stories about weddings and honeymoons. Story 1: Raniero marries Fosca, his second wife. Their honeymoon in Venice turns tragic when Fosca realizes that she cannot stand a chance if compared to Raniero's first wife. In the end, Fosca commits suicide, just like the other woman did. Story 2: The vulgar Ivano is married to Jessica. Their wedding journey is an uncompromising tour of discos. Soon the two realize that their relationship is running dry. After several attempts to revive their passion, they fall into a state of depression and boredom. Story 3: Newlyweds Giovannino and Valeria are about to leave for a cruise. Eventually Giovannino is forced to look after his elderly father, who has been abandoned by the caretaker. Meanwhile, Valeria takes care of her sister, who pretends to commit suicide to get money from her ex-boyfriend. Their honeymoon turns into a nightmare.::X
A small town's women give birth to unfriendly alien children posing as humans.::Rob Hartill

An awkward seventh-grader struggles to cope with inattentive parents, snobbish class-mates, a smart older brother, an attractive younger sister and her own insecurities in suburban New Jersey.::John Sacksteder <jsack@ka.net>
A hopelessly romantic Chicago Transit Authority token collector is mistaken for the fiancée of a coma patient.::Anonymous
When a sixteen-year-old high school student finds out she's a witch, her two aunts offer guidance on how to control her newly-discovered magical powers.
One of puppet-maker Geppetto's creations comes magically to life. This puppet named Pinocchio has one major desire, to become a real boy someday, but he has to learn to act responsibly.
The brief life of Jean Michel Basquiat, a world renowned New York street artist struggling with fame, drugs and his identity.::Will S
A piano player at a crossroads in his life returns home to his friends and their own problems with life and love.::Lordship <lordship@juno.com>
A gay cabaret owner and his drag queen companion agree to put up a false straight front so that their son can introduce them to his fiancée's right-wing moralistic parents.::Kenneth Chisholm
Three friends plan to pull off a simple robbery and go on the run.::mystic80
Tough ex-con Corky and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.::DitaBound <goddess_dita@email.com>
Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>

Levante lives in a small city near Florence (Tuscany, Italy) and his life is plain and a bit boring, until the day the twister arrives: a bus with six Spanish flamenco dancers that will twist Levante and his family life.::Lapo Luchini <dr.brain@iol.it>

fields.movie_title: Don't Be a Menace to South Central While Drinking Your Juice in the Hood
fields.plot: A parody of several U.S. films about being in the 'Hood', for instance Boyz n the Hood (1991), South Central (1992), Menace II Society (1993), Higher Learning (1995) and Juice (1992).
At the close of World War II, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.::LVJeff
A father and daughter decide to attempt to lead a flock of orphaned Canada Geese south by air.::Anonymous

After a tragic car accident that kills his wife, a man discovers he can communicate with the dead to con people. However, when a demonic spirit appears, he may be the only one who can stop it from killing the living and the dead.
Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.::Carl Schultz
A bridge engineer and an experienced old hunter begin a hunt for two lions after they start attacking local construction workers.::Anonymous
Hamlet, Prince of Denmark, returns home to find his father murdered and his mother remarrying the murderer, his uncle. Meanwhile, war is brewing.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A deformed bell-ringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancer.::Kenneth Chisholm
The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.::Rob Hartill

When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent agent with the only athlete who stays with him and his former colleague.::Kenneth Chisholm and assmn316
When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
Anonymous videotapes presage a musician's murder conviction, and a gangster's girlfriend leads a mechanic astray.
After seventeen years, a fiercely independent woman and her rebellious son return home and together they turn the family she left behind upside down.
This film adaptation of a Roald Dahl work tells the story of Matilda Wormwood, a gifted girl forced to put up with a crude, distant father and mother.

Neil Jordan's historical biopic of Irish revolutionary Michael Collins, the man who led a guerrilla war against the UK, helped negotiate the creation of the Irish Free State, and led the National Army during the Irish Civil War.::Anonymous
An American agent, under false suspicion of disloyalty, must discover and expose the real spy without the help of his organization.::Anonymous
The story of controversial pornography publisher Larry Flynt, and how he became a defender of free speech.::Kenneth Chisholm and assmn316

The Phantom, descendent of a line of African superheroes, travels to New York City to thwart a wealthy criminal genius from obtaining three magic skulls which would give him the secret to ultimate power.::<crow_steve@hotmail.com>
An altar boy is accused of murdering a priest, and the truth is buried several layers deep.::Anonymous
A drug pusher grows increasingly desperate after a botched deal leaves him with a large debt to a ruthless drug lord.::J. Johnson

A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.::Anonymous
Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.::Anonymous
Following the death of her adoptive parents, a successful young black optometrist establishes contact with her biological mother -- a lonely white factory worker living in poverty in East London.
Desperation drives four inner-city women to bank robbery in Los Angeles, then they start mistrusting each other.
Pianist David Helfgott, driven by his father and teachers, has a breakdown. Years later he returns to the piano, to popular if not critical acclaim.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>

After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized. Thirteen years later, an unexpected random encounter with a former guard gives them a chance for revenge.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.::Gunome Grapeseed

The Borg travel back in time intent on preventing Earth's first contact with an alien species. Captain Picard and his crew pursue them to ensure that Zefram Cochrane makes his maiden flight reaching warp speed.
After her mother commits suicide, a young woman travels to Italy in search of love, truth and a deeper connection with herself.::Will S
A wannabe actor has a hard time moving on from a break-up, but he is lucky to have supportive friends.::Anonymous

While doing a thesis about violence, Ángela finds a snuff video where a girl is tortured until death. Soon she discovers that the girl was a former student in her faculty...::Miguel Ángel Díaz González
A local Pennsylvania band scores a one hit wonder in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as they can, with lots of help from its manager.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com> and assmn316

In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his ten-year-old daughter, inciting violent retribution and revenge from the Ku Klux Klan.::MadMovieManiac and assmn316
Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>

The warrior King Odysseus leaves his idyllic life in the kingdom of Ithaca to fight in the Trojan War. After winning the war, he now must endure a lengthy, ten-year journey to return, and with all his wits, Odysseus must overcome deadly monsters, powerful forces of nature, seductive enchantresses, and even journey into the bowels of the Underworld.
A secret military team, SG-1, is formed to explore other planets through the recently discovered Stargates.::Sean Fitzgibbons <lobot@mail.idt.net>

In 1839, the revolt of Mende captives aboard a Spanish owned ship causes a major controversy in the United States when the ship is captured off the coast of Long Island. The courts must decide whether the Mende are slaves or legally free.
The last surviving child of the Russian Royal Family joins two con men to reunite with her grandmother, the Dowager Empress, while the undead Rasputin seeks her death.::Kenneth Chisholm

Two neighbors, a woman and a man, form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.::Skip_4591
Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
Back when sex was safe, pleasure was a business and business was booming, an idealistic porn producer aspires to elevate his craft to an art when he discovers a hot young talent.
An ex-soldier with a personal honor code enters the family crime business in St. Petersburg, Russia.::statmanjeff
A man searches for his missing wife after his car breaks down in the middle of the desert.::Robert Krzanowski <stonedpsycho@hotmail.com>

After being released from prison, Billy is set to visit his parents with his wife, whom he does not actually have. This provokes Billy to act out, as he kidnaps a girl and forces her to act as his wife for the visit.::Dave

When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.::J. S. Golden
After leaving jail, Víctor is still in love with Elena, but she's married to the former cop -now basketball player- who became paralysed by a shot from Víctor's gun...::Miguel Ángel Díaz González

Holden and Banky are comic book artists. Everything's going good for them until they meet Alyssa, also a comic book artist. Holden falls for her, but his hopes are crushed when he finds out she's a lesbian.::Kevin Gillease

Matko and his son Zare live on the banks of the Danube river and get by through hustling and basically doing anything to make a living. In order to pay off a business debt Matko agrees to marry off Zare to the sister of a local gangster.::grantss
After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.::J. S. Golden
Newly paroled ex-con and former U.S. Ranger Cameron Poe finds himself trapped in a prisoner transport plane when the passengers seize control.::Kenneth Chisholm
The Sheriff of a suburban New Jersey community, populated by New York City police officers, slowly discovers the town is a front for mob connections and corruption.::Gabe Taverney (duke1029@aol.com)
A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.::John Sacksteder <jsack@ka.net>

Suffering from writer's block and eagerly awaiting his writing award, Harry Block remembers events from his past and scenes from his best-selling books as characters, real and fictional, come back to haunt him.::Anonymous
An exceptionally adept Florida lawyer is offered a job at a high-end New York City law firm with a high-end boss - the biggest opportunity of his career to date.::Radishes
An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.::Kenneth Chisholm
A few friends have a weekly fools' dinner, where each brings a fool along. Pierre finds a champion fool for next dinner. Surprise.::Scott Filtenborg
An intellectual billionaire and two other men struggle to band together and survive after getting stranded in the Alaskan wilderness with a blood-thirsty Kodiak Bear hunting them down.

To foil a terrorist plot, an FBI agent undergoes facial transplant surgery to assume the identity of the criminal mastermind who murdered his only son, but the criminal wakes up prematurely and seeks revenge.::vsuperkuns
Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution, the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.::Anonymous
In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.::Murray Chapman
Six unemployed steel workers form a male striptease act. The women cheer them on to go for "the full monty" - total nudity.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
After a wealthy banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down when he becomes unable to distinguish between the game and reality.::Phox
A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.::Anonymous
Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.::Colin Tinto <cst@imdb.com>

Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.::Gustaf Molin <gumo@hem2.passagen.se>
Nishi leaves the police in the face of harrowing personal and professional difficulties. Spiraling into depression, he makes questionable decisions.::Daniel Jos. Leary
Professional gambler Sydney teaches John the tricks of the trade. John does well until he falls for cocktail waitress Clementine.::Jonathan Hayward
The son of Zeus and Hera is stripped of his immortality as an infant and must become a true hero in order to reclaim it.::Kenneth Chisholm
The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.::Anonymous
In suburban New Canaan, Connecticut, 1973, middle-class families experimenting with casual sex and substance abuse find their lives beyond their control.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
An imprisoned I.R.A. fighter is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly "faceless" assassin from completing his next job.
A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.::DeeKeyera
Two terminally ill patients escape from a hospital, steal a car and rush towards the sea.
From childhood to adulthood, Tibet's fourteenth Dalai Lama deals with Chinese oppression and other problems.::Anonymous
As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.::Trance
An English professor falls for a minor , and has to face the consequences of his actions.::saja aljassim
Death, who takes the form of a young man, asks a media mogul to act as a guide to teach him about life on Earth, and in the process, he falls in love with his guide's daughter.::Mystic80
A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.
A Hostage Negotiator teams up with a Sharpshooter to bring down a dangerous jewel thief.::Phox

On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.::Shadowdancer21b
A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.::Kenneth Chisholm

fields.movie_title: Pooh's Grand Adventure: The Search for Christopher Robin
fields.plot: Winnie the Pooh and company embark on a quest to rescue Christopher Robin from certain doom in a place called "Skull" after misreading a note he left for them.
A nameless drifter dons a postman's uniform and bag of mail as he begins a quest to inspire hope to the survivors living in post-apocalyptic America.::anonymous
An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.::Krishna G

A domestic farce exposes the eccentricities of a "typical" middle class, suburban family who find their lives thrown into a crisis with the unexpected arrival of one of the wife's old flames.::Film Four
The true story of Selena, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart topping albums on the Latin music charts.::Jojo Mac
True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.::Anonymous
Simba's daughter is the key to a resolution of a bitter feud between Simba's pride and the outcast pride led by the mate of Scar.::Kenneth Chisholm
World famous pop group the Spice Girls zip around London in their luxurious double decker tour bus having various adventures and performing for their fans.::Daniel Jos. Leary
Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.::Kenneth Chisholm
A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to the town to defend the families, but he discovers that everything is not what it seems.
An Iranian man drives his truck in search of someone who will quietly bury him under a cherry tree after he commits suicide.::Anonymous

Three blue-collar acquaintances come across millions of dollars in lost cash and make a plan to keep their find from the authorities, but it isn't long before complications and mistrust weave their way into the plan.::Daniel Jos. Leary
A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.::j-jessie-weaver

When Woody is stolen by a toy collector, Buzz and his friends set out on a rescue mission to save Woody before he becomes a museum toy property with his roundup gang Jessie, Prospector, and Bullseye.::Steve Shedloski
An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.::BCDavis <wdavis@netins.net>
A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.::<jarls@datasync.com>
After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas is going to impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep-core drillers to save the planet.::Devin Rush
A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.::Kenneth Chisholm
A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.::Adam Pierson

At an archaeological dig in the ancient city of Hamunaptra, an American serving in the French Foreign Legion accidentally awakens a mummy who begins to wreak havoc as he searches for the reincarnation of his long-lost love.::ahmetkozan
A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.::Kenneth Chisholm
When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.::Benjamin Rothrock
The Brothers Grimm arrive at the home of a wealthy Grande Dame who speaks of the many legends surrounding the fable of the cinder girl before telling the "true" story of her ancestor.
An angel on Earth, a doctor unable to believe, a patient with a secret, a love story made in Heaven.::Chockys

An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.::Jim Ruderer, Jr. <boywundr@abraxis.com>
A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.::Kenneth Chisholm
A New York City doctor embarks on a harrowing, night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife reveals a painful secret to him.::Ogre and Brian McInnis

fields.movie_title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
fields.plot: An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>
In Victorian-era London, a troubled clairvoyant police detective investigates the murders of Jack the Ripper.::Kenneth Chisholm
The last days of Frankenstein (1931) Director James Whale are explored.::Dave F
A terminally-ill woman must deal with her ex-husband's new lover, who will be their children's stepmother.::mystic80
The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.::Chris White
A baby boy, discovered in 1900 on an ocean liner, grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.::Brent Aliverti

fields.movie_title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
fields.plot: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.::salooh-86306

fields.movie_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
fields.plot: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.::Paul Twomey <toomsp@hotmail.com> and Brian McInnis

Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, later discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.::Daniel Jos. Leary
After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.::vsuperkuns
Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom, where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.::Kenneth Chisholm
Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.
Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.::Kenneth Chisholm
An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit, and a goofy two-headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.::Hannah Ling
A red-colored violin inspires passion, making its way through three centuries over several owners and countries, eventually ending up at an auction where it may find a new owner.::LVJeff

A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.::MadMovieManiac
Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.::Chris White
Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.::Anonymous

In 1984, British journalist Arthur Stuart investigates the career of 1970s glam superstar Brian Slade, who was heavily influenced in his early years by hard-living and rebellious American singer Curt Wild.::Anonymous
Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a Presidential sex scandal.::Hugo Lopes
Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.::miselainis

In a world where mutants (evolved super-powered humans) exist and are discriminated against, two groups form for an inevitable clash: the supremacist Brotherhood, and the pacifist X-Men.::Kenneth Chisholm
A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.::TimeNTide
An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.::Kenneth Chisholm
Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.::Richard Hudson
When a shy groom practices his wedding vows in the inadvertent presence of a deceased young woman, she rises from the grave assuming he has married her.::Kenneth Chisholm

fields.movie_title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
fields.plot: Three years into the Clone Wars, the Jedi rescue Palpatine from Count Dooku. As Obi-Wan pursues a new threat, Anakin acts as a double agent between the Jedi Council and Palpatine and is lured into a sinister plan to rule the galaxy.::Travis Brainerd
The story of Piero from childhood to fatherhood, over the background of Livorno's neighborhood Ovosodo.::sgt_pepper91
A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
A dying seagull entrusts her egg to a cat named Zorba, who promises three things: he won't eat the egg, he'll care for the egg, and he'll teach the baby seagull to fly.
Six complete strangers with widely varying personalities are involuntarily placed in an endless maze containing deadly traps.::thegreatoldone
The story of the life of Gia Carangi, a top fashion model from the late 1970s, from her meteoric rise to the forefront of the modeling industry, to her untimely death.::<ojenkins@mbhs.edu>
A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.::Kenneth Chisholm
A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.::Anonymous
The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.::Anonymous
Paulie, a talking parrot, recounts his travels looking for his original owner to a Russian janitor who helps him to the end of his journey.::Ken Carrell <kencarrell21@gmail.com>
A very handsome man finds the love of his life, but he suffers an accident and needs to have his face rebuilt by surgery after it is severely disfigured.::Pablo Montoya <canarias15@ctv.es>
The life and career of legendary comedian Andy Kaufman.::Kenneth Chisholm
A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.::ReptilePatrol
A high school teacher meets his match in an over-achieving student politician.
A Secret Agent loses his memory after falling from a crashing helicopter. He is then chased by several other agency operatives, but he has no idea why.::John Sacksteder <jsack@ka.net>
The early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.::Kenneth Chisholm
A complete graduating class, consisting of beautiful girls, geeks and promising footballers, assemble at a rich classmate's residence for a party. Interesting developments follow at the get-together.
The extracurricular king of Rushmore Preparatory School is put on academic probation.
A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.::ralo229

The true story of a heroic man, Hunter "Patch" Adams, determined to become a medical doctor because he enjoys helping people. He ventured where no doctor had ventured before, using humour and pathos.::kingnoel_john
In a remote military outpost in the 19th century, Captain John Boyd and his regiment embark on a rescue mission which takes a dark turn when they are ambushed by a sadistic cannibal.::Dan DiCenzo
After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.::Sunny Murphy
The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.::Kenneth Chisholm
When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.
In 2029, an Air Force astronaut crash-lands on a mysterious planet where evolved, talking apes dominate a race of primitive humans.::emauger1
In the early 1980s Stevo and Heroin Bob are the only two dedicated punks in conservative Salt Lake City.::Anonymous
A Disney animated version of "Treasure Island". The only difference is that this movie is set in outer space with alien worlds and other galactic wonders.::Paolo Costabel <paolo@bluesky-vifx.com>

In late 1950s New York, Tom Ripley, a young underachiever, is sent to Italy to retrieve Dickie Greenleaf, a rich and spoiled millionaire playboy. But when the errand fails, Ripley takes extreme measures.::<james.r.patterson@vanderbilt.edu>

A commercial transport ship and its crew are marooned on a planet full of bloodthirsty creatures that only come out to feast at night. But then, they learn that a month-long eclipse is about to occur.::Skip4591
Three friends cross Italy by car in order to deliver their boss his dog and a wooden leg.::Anonymous
A man begins to suspect his neighbors are not what they appear to be and their secrets could be deadly.::João Ferreira
An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.::jrofficial and Joao Bravo
The world's greatest ever playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.::Anonymous
A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.::LVJeff
Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.::Paolo Costabel <paolo@bluesky-vifx.com>
Two vicious step-siblings of an elite Manhattan prep school make a wager: to deflower the new headmaster's daughter before the start of term.::tanm_86
The aftermath of a drug deal as told from three different points of view.::Joshua Shane Davis <thehornedking@webtv.net>
A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.::mystic80 and assmn316
A computer scientist running a virtual reality simulation of 1937 becomes the primary suspect when his colleague and mentor is murdered.::TompaDompa
A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a 60 Minutes exposé on Big Tobacco.::Gabe Taverney

An emotive journey of a former school teacher, who writes letters for illiterate people, and a young boy, whose mother has just died, as they search for the father he never knew.::Fabio Ornelas <fabiornelas@zipmail.com.br>
The universe is thrown into dimensional chaos as the dead come back to life. Now Goku and Vegeta must track down the cause of this uproar.
Bojack is a demon who was freed from prison when King Kai's planet was destroyed. Now, without his father Goku by his side, can Gohan save the Earth?

fields.movie_title: Dragon Ball Z: Broly - Second Coming
fields.plot: After seven years went by, Gohan grows up during the time around Goten's birth. Goku died and when Goten cries, Broly regains life and the Z warriors must stop him again.

fields.movie_title: Dragon Ball Z: Broly - The Legendary Super Saiyan
fields.plot: Vegeta is lured to the planet New Vegeta by a group of Saiyan survivors in hopes that he will be the king of their new planet. But when he finds that they have ulterior motives of universal domination, he and the Z Warriors must fight Broly, the legendary Super Saiyan.::page8701

fields.movie_title: Dragon Ball Z: Wrath of the Dragon
fields.plot: A mysterious being named Hoy arrives on Earth and asks the Z Warriors to use the dragon balls to help him release Tapion. Tapion, an ancient warrior imprisoned in a music box, and Hoy needs him to fend off the monster Hildegarn, who is coming to destroy the Earth. But when they realize that Hoy is the last survivor of an evil race bent on the destruction of those who they consider inferior, and that by releasing Tapion they also released Hildegarn, they must fight alongside Tapion to stop the monster.::page8701

fields.movie_title: Dragon Ball Z: Bardock - The Father of Goku
fields.plot: The tale of Bardock, the father of Goku, and his rebellion against his master the mighty Frieza.

fields.movie_title: Dragon Ball Z: The History of Trunks
fields.plot: In a dark future where the Androids have taken over Earth, Gohan and his student Trunks are the last defense against these deadly killing machines.
When Mr. Freeze, desperate to save his dying wife, kidnaps Barbara Gordon (Batgirl) as an involuntary organ donor, Batman and Robin must find her before the operation can begin.::Kenneth Chisholm

A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.::Sean Christopher
Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.::Anonymous

When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.::Kenneth Chisholm
A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.::Keith Tyler <romulus@shore.net>
In October 1962, the Kennedy administration struggles to contain the Cuban Missile Crisis.::Kenneth Chisholm and assmn316
A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.::Anonymous
Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A pretty, popular teenager can't go out on a date until her ill-tempered older sister does.::Dynasti
Two teenage girls in small-town Sweden. Elin is beautiful, popular, and bored with life. Agnes is friendless, sad, and secretly in love with Elin.::Anonymous
Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.::Guy Johns
At Helge's 60th birthday party, some unpleasant family truths are revealed.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.::Murray Chapman <muzzle@imdb.com>
A shy boy grows up in 1940s Mississippi with the help of his beloved dog, Skip.::Stephen Hughes
A pop singer gives up her career to become an actress, but she slowly goes insane when she starts being stalked by an obsessed fan and what seems to be a ghost of her past.::Kenneth Chisholm
A horse meat butcher's life and mind begins to breakdown as he lashes out against various factions of society while attempting to reconnect with his estranged daughter.::Helltopay27
In the 1930s, jazz guitarist Emmet Ray idolizes Django Reinhardt, faces gangsters and falls in love with a mute woman.::Anonymous
A strikingly beautiful young woman is raised from birth to be a deadly instrument of revenge against the swindlers who destroyed her family.::Fred Cabral <ftcabral@hotmail.com>
When Stan Marsh and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.::removing the apostrophe in "parents"
A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid 1970s.::jgp3553@yahoo.com
In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.::Anonymous
A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.::Noah Orent

With only the plan of moving in together after high school, two unusually devious friends seek direction in life. As a mere gag, they respond to a man's newspaper ad for a date, only to find it will greatly complicate their lives.::ImpeccablyBlunt@gmail.com
After being hypnotized by his sister-in-law, a man begins seeing haunting visions of a girl's ghost and a mystery begins to unfold around him.::Mystic80

A wealthy attorney in San Juan comes to the police station for "10 minutes" of follow-up questions to finding a 12-year-old girl's body in a park. Another young girl was also raped and murdered weeks earlier and the evidence points to him.::Scott Filtenborg
In 1978, four rebellious teenagers try to scam their way into a KISS concert.

fields.movie_title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
fields.plot: An African-American Mafia hit man who models himself after the samurai of old finds himself targeted for death by the mob.::Kenneth Chisholm

Neal Oliver, a very confused young man and an artist, takes a journey of a lifetime on a highway I60 that doesn't exist on any of the maps, going to the places he never even heard of, searching for an answer and his dreamgirl.
An extremely volatile and dangerous Englishman goes to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his daughter's death.::<jgp3553@excite.com>

fields.movie_title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
fields.plot: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace, and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.::scgary66

An old man makes a long journey by lawnmower to mend his relationship with an ill brother.::Anonymous

fields.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.::ahmetkozan

fields.movie_title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

A mysterious thief has stolen the prosperous Happy Valley's most prized possession: the musical Singing Harp. Can Mickey, Donald, and Goofy find the answer in the irritable Willie the Giant's magnificent castle up in the blue sky?::Nick Riganas
History of Apple and Microsoft.::Josh Forman
An East European girl travels to the United States with her young son, expecting it to be like a Hollywood film.::Gabriel Laverdiere <teknobabble@hotmail.com>

Antwone Fisher, a young navy man, is forced to see a psychiatrist after a violent outburst against a fellow crewman. During the course of treatment a painful past is revealed and a new hope begins.::Robin (rrasooner@yahoo.com>

fields.movie_title: Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion

A study in fear escalates into a heart-stopping nightmare for a professor and three subjects trapped in a mysterious mansion.
A young man named Brandon Teena navigates love, life, and being transgender in rural Nebraska.::Reyna Yruegas
Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the late 1960s.::anonymous
A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.::Noah Orent

During their college years, Anjali was in love with her best-friend Rahul, but he had eyes only for Tina. Years later, Rahul and the now-deceased Tina's eight-year-old daughter attempts to reunite her father and Anjali.::L. Hamre
When a young girl living with her good-witch grandmother learns she too is a witch, she must help her grandmother save Halloweentown from evil forces.::Dynasti Noble
The story of 'Rubin 'Hurricane Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.::Kenneth Chisholm
An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.::Sean C.

The alumni cast of a space opera television series have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help. However, they also have to defend both Earth and the alien race from a reptilian warlord.::Kenneth Chisholm
Fanny, born into a poor family, is sent away to live with wealthy uncle Sir Thomas, his wife and their four children, where she'll be brought up for a proper introduction to society.
A reporter and her ex-husband investigate a cursed video tape that is rumored to kill the viewer seven days after watching it.::unknown

In a Napoleonic era insane asylum, an inmate, the irrepressible Marquis De Sade, fights a battle of wills against a tyrannically prudish doctor.::Kenneth Chisholm
The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.::someguy

Publicist Stuart Shepard finds himself trapped in a phone booth, pinned down by an extortionist's sniper rifle. Unable to leave or receive outside help, Stuart's negotiation with the caller leads to a jaw-dropping climax.::jesusblack-30225
A film about the life and career of the American painter, Jackson Pollock.::<kchishol@home.com>
After his master dies, a peasant squire, fueled by his desire for food and glory, creates a new identity for himself as a knight.::Anonymous

Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.::Denny Gibbons
Five friends spend one lost weekend in a mix of music, love and club culture.::Anonymous
Two veteran salesmen dissect a sales pitch to a particular client, through their young protégé.::mystic80

The filming of Nosferatu, eine Symphonie des Grauens (1922) is hampered by the fact that its star Max Schreck is taking the role of a vampire far more seriously than seems humanly possible.::Kenneth Chisholm
A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.::paulrichard
In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.::Skip4591

fields.movie_title: Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
fields.plot: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.::Ian Pugh <skypilot@ezaccess.net>

In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.::gamergcfan

A young, naive boy sets out alone on the road to find his wayward mother. Soon he finds an unlikely protector in a crotchety man and the two have a series of unexpected adventures along the way.::Daniel Jos. Leary
Monica and Quincy love and play basketball together through many life challenges from childhood to adulthood.::Jonathan Hayward

Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry along with a treasure trove of dirty secrets.::Anonymous
A poet falls for a beautiful courtesan whom a jealous duke covets.::LVJeff
The story of Carl Brashear, the first African-American U.S. Navy Diver, and the man who trained him.::Kenneth Chisholm
Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits "retired" safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.::Jon Reeves <jreeves@imdb.com>
The life and misadventures of a family in contemporary Japan.::Kenneth Chisholm
In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.::Anonymous and Brian McInnis
Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.::<jgp3553@excite.com>
A mysterious young girl wanders a desolate, otherworldly landscape, carrying a large egg.::Rev. Elgaroo Brenza
A psychoanalyst and his family go through profound emotional trauma when their son dies in a scuba diving accident.::Kenneth Chisholm
A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.::Noah Orent
Two death-obsessed sisters, outcasts in their suburban neighborhood, must deal with the tragic consequences when one of them is bitten by a deadly werewolf.::Faize

A group of 12 teenagers from various backgrounds enroll at the American Ballet Academy in New York to make it as ballet dancers and each one deals with the problems and stress of training and getting ahead in the world of dance.::Matt Patay
The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.::Kenneth Chisholm

A man tours clubs around the globe with his manager and girlfriend. On the eve of their largest album release he is admitted to a psychiatric clinic after overdosing at a gig.::FilmFinders
Several women enter a science fiction author's life over the course of a few years, after the author has lost the woman he considers his one true love.::Skip_4591
A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become "real" so that he can regain the love of his human mother.::<jgp3553@excite.com>
A tale of war and romance mixed in with history. The story follows two lifelong friends and a beautiful nurse who are caught up in the horror of an infamous Sunday morning in 1941.
Amidst the war climate, a teenage boy discovering himself becomes love-stricken by Malèna, a sensual woman living in a small, narrow-minded Italian town.::lazypixel
A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.::<jgp3553@yahoo.com>
When a girl is abducted by a vampire, a legendary bounty hunter is hired to bring her back.::Lordship
In 1862, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.::Shannon Patrick Sullivan <shannon@mun.ca>

A man learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.::<scott@higherstate.com>
A "behind the scenes" look into the highly competitive and cut-throat world of dog-shows through the eyes of a group of ruthless dog owners.
The story of how George Jung, along with the Medellín Cartel headed by Pablo Escobar, established the American cocaine market in the 1970s in the United States.::<kchishol@home.com> and assmn316

Chopper tells the intense story of Mark "Chopper" Read, a legendary criminal who wrote his autobiography while serving a jail sentence in prison. His book, "From the Inside", upon which the film is based, was a best-seller.::Anonymous
A young boy attempts to make the world a better place after his teacher gives him that chance.::Anonymous
An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a young kid convinces him into doing one last heist.::Anonymous
A young linguist named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.::IMDb Editors
A woman who lives in her darkened old family house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that the home is haunted.::Kenneth Chisholm
A workaholic executive, and an unconventional woman agree to a personal relationship for a short period. In this short period she changes his life.::Al Turner
Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Conner must decide where his loyalty really lies when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.::rball4042; Car7

fields.movie_title: Batman Beyond: Return of the Joker
fields.plot: The Joker is back with a vengeance, and Gotham's newest Dark Knight needs answers as he stands alone to face Gotham's most infamous Clown Prince of Crime.::Peter Gonzalez

Freedom fighters Neo, Trinity and Morpheus continue to lead the revolt against the Machine Army, unleashing their arsenal of extraordinary skills and weaponry against the systematic forces of repression and exploitation.
A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.::<rag@kabelfoon.nl>
